children.name: Audit
children.description: Audit

children.name: Account Management Overview
children.description: See see trends in operation for users, roles, and access as well as Admin activities.
children.title: Account Management Overview

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit class=user (action=create or action=disable or action=modify) status=SUCCESS
| where _sourceCategory="account_management"
| timeslice 12h
| count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action

_index=sumologic_audit 
| where _sourceCategory="account_management"
| count as count by _messagetime, sourceuser, action, class, target, status | sort by _messagetime
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss.SSS", "UTC") as time
| fields -_messagetime, count
| fields time, sourceuser, action, class, target, status

_index=sumologic_audit 
| where _sourceCategory="account_management"
| timeslice 12h
| count by _timeslice, class
| transpose row _timeslice column class

panels.title: Admin Activities by User Over Time

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit 
| where _sourceCategory="account_management"
| timeslice 12h
| count by _timeslice, sourceuser
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceuser

_index=sumologic_audit 
| where _sourceCategory="account_management"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = _sourceHost 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code 
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit class=access_key (action=create or action=delete or action=enable or action=disable) status=SUCCESS
| where _sourceCategory="account_management"
| timeslice 12h
| count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action

_index=sumologic_audit class=role (action=create or action=delete or action=modify) status=SUCCESS
| where _sourceCategory="account_management"
| timeslice 12h
| count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action

children.name: Library Content - Admin Mode
children.description: See when content is deleted, moved, whitelisted, and shared. As well as when permission is added or removed.
children.title: Library Content - Admin Mode

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity "AdminMode=true"
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "User * updated the following permissions on * \"*\". \nAdded: *\nRemoved: *" as user,content_type,content_name,added_permissions,removed_permissions nodrop
| parse regex field=removed_permissions "(?<removedperm>\(.+?: .+?\))" multi
| parse regex field=removedperm "\((?<removed_permission_from>.+)<(?<permission_target>.+)>: (?<removed_permissions>.+)\)" 
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser,content_type,content_name, removed_permission_from, permission_target, removed_permissions

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity "AdminMode=true"
| parse "User * deleted * \"*\"" as sourceuser,content_type,content_name
| where action ="DELETE"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name
| fields - _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity "AdminMode=true"
| parse "moved * \"*\" into folder *" as content_type,content_name,target_folder_location
| where action ="MOVE"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name, target_folder_location
| fields - _count

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity "AdminMode=true"
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by sourceuser, _raw

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity "AdminMode=true"
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "User * updated the following permissions on * \"*\". \nAdded: *\nRemoved: *" as user,content_type,content_name,added_permissions,removed_permissions nodrop
| parse regex field=added_permissions "(?<addedperm>\(.+?: .+?\))" multi
| parse regex field=addedperm "\((?<added_permission_to>.+)<(?<permission_target>.+)>: (?<added_permissions>.+)\)" 
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by  date_time, sourceuser,content_type,content_name,added_permission_to, permission_target, added_permissions

panels.title: Content Whitelisted and Shared with World

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity "updated visibility" "AdminMode=true" (World or Whitelist)
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "updated visibility of * \"*\" to *" as content_type,content_name,visibility_level
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type,content_name,visibility_level
| sort by visibility_level
| fields - _count

children.name: Library Content - Created/Deleted/Moved/Copied/Updated
children.description: See when content is created or deleted. As as a counts, trends, and outliers in content creation or deletion.
children.title: Library Content - Created/Deleted/Moved/Copied/Updated

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "created * \"*\" into folder \"*\"" as content_type,content_name,folder_location
| where action ="CREATE"
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by  sourceuser

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="DELETE"
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice, sourceuser
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceuser
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="DELETE"
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by  sourceuser

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "created * \"*\" into folder \"*\"" as content_type,content_name,folder_location
| where action ="CREATE"
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice
| outlier _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity "updated name/description"
| where action ="UPDATE"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
| parse "updated name/description of * \"*\" from (*,*) to (*,*)" as content_type,content_name,old_name,old_desc,new_name,new_desc
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type,content_name,old_name,old_desc,new_name,new_desc

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "moved * \"*\" into folder \"*\"" as content_type,content_name,target_folder_location
| where action ="MOVE"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name, target_folder_location
| fields - _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "created * \"*\" into folder \"*\"" as content_type,content_name,folder_location
| where action ="CREATE"
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice, sourceuser
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceuser
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "copied * \"*\" into folder \"*\" as \"*\"" as content_type,content_name,target_folder_location,copied_content_name
| where action ="COPY"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name,target_folder_location, copied_content_name
| fields - _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "User * deleted * \"*\"" as src_user,content_type,content_name
| where action ="DELETE"
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice
| outlier _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "User * deleted * \"*\" in folder \"*\"" as sourceuser,content_type,content_name, source_folder
| where action ="DELETE"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name, source_folder
| fields - _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| parse "created * \"*\" into folder \"*\"" as content_type,content_name,folder_location
| where action ="CREATE"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name, folder_location
| fields - _count

sourceDefinition.query:
_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity "updated name/description"
| where action ="UPDATE"
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
| parse "updated name/description of * \"*\" from (*,*) to (*,*)" as content_type,content_name,old_name,old_desc,new_name,new_desc

children.name: Library Content - Imported/Exported/Installed/Shared Publicly
children.description: See when content is shared, exported or imported. As well as count and trends in content that has been shared, exported or imported.
children.title: Library Content - Imported/Exported/Installed/Shared Publicly

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="EXPORT"
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by sourceuser

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity "updated visibility"
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "updated visibility of * \"*\" to *" as content_type,content_name,visibility_level
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type,content_name

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="EXPORT"
| parse "exported * \"*\"" as content_type,content_name
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice
| outlier _count

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity //"updated visibility"
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "updated visibility of * \"*\" to *" as content_type,content_name,visibility_level
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by content_name

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="EXPORT"
| parse "exported * \"*\"" as content_type,content_name
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name
| fields - _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="EXPORT"
| parse "exported * \"*\"" as content_type,content_name
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice, sourceuser
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceuser
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="INSTALL"
| parse "installed application (*, *) into folder \"*\" as \"*\"" as app_name,app_id,target_folder_location,app_name2
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time,sourceuser, app_name

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="IMPORT"
| parse "imported * \"*\" into folder \"*\"" as content_type,content_name,target_folder_location
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type, content_name, target_folder_location
| fields - _count

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity "updated visibility"
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "updated visibility of * \"*\" to *" as content_type,content_name,visibility_level
| where visibility_level in ("World", "Whitelist")
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser, content_type,content_name,visibility_level
| sort by visibility_level
| fields - _count

children.name: Library Content - Overview
children.description: See an overview of Audit Library content, including location of users, user activity, outliers by user, and breakdowns by action.
children.title: Library Content - Overview

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by action
| sort by _count | compare with timeshift 1d

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity 
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice, sourceuser
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceuser
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity 
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by  action

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity 
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice, sourceuser
| outlier _count by sourceuser 
| fields _timeslice,sourceuser, _count_violation
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceuser

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity 
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice, action
| outlier _count by action 
| fields _timeslice,action, _count_violation
| transpose row _timeslice column action

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity 
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
| timeslice 1h
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity | where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = _sourceHost
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity 
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by status

_view=sumologic_audit   _sourceCategory=user_activity 
| where action in ("MANAGE_PERMISSIONS" , "CREATE", "DELETE", "MOVE", "COPY", "UPDATE", "IMPORT", "EXPORT","INSTALL")
|where if ("{{sourceuser}}" = "*", true, sourceuser matches "{{sourceuser}}")
|count by  sourceuser
| sort by _count
| limit 10

children.name: Library Content - Updated Permission
children.description: See when permission is added or removed. As well as a breakdown, and count of permission being added or deleted by type or content.
children.title: Library Content - Updated Permission

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "User * updated the following permissions on * \"*\". \nAdded: *\nRemoved: *" as user,content_type,content_name,added_permissions,removed_permissions nodrop
| parse regex field=removed_permissions "(?<removedperm>\(.+?: .+?\))" multi
| parse regex field=removedperm "\((?<removed_permission_from>.+)<(?<permission_target>.+)>: (?<removed_permissions>.+)\)" 
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss") as date_time
|where if ("{{added_permissions}}" = "*", true, added_permissions matches "{{added_permissions}}")
|count by date_time, sourceuser,content_type,content_name, removed_permission_from, permission_target, removed_permissions

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "User * updated the following permissions on * \"*\". \nAdded: *\nRemoved: *" as user,content_type,content_name,added_permissions,removed_permissions nodrop
| parse regex field=removed_permissions "(?<removedperm>\(.+?: .+?\))" multi
| parse regex field=removedperm "\((?<removed_permission_from>.+)<(?<permission_target>.+)>: (?<removed_permissions>.+)\)"
|where if ("{{added_permissions}}" = "*", true, added_permissions matches "{{added_permissions}}")
|count by content_name
| sort by _count

| parse regex field=removedperm "\((?<removed_permission_from>.+)<(?<permission_target>.+)>: (?<removed_permissions>.+)\)"
|where if ("{{added_permissions}}" = "*", true, added_permissions matches "{{added_permissions}}")
|count by removed_permission_from

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"
| parse "User * updated the following permissions on * \"*\". \nAdded: *\nRemoved: *" as user,content_type,content_name,added_permissions,removed_permissions nodrop
| parse regex field=added_permissions "(?<addedperm>\(.+?: .+?\))" multi
| parse regex field=addedperm "\((?<added_permission_to>.+)<(?<permission_target>.+)>: (?<added_permissions>.+)\)"
|where if ("{{added_permissions}}" = "*", true, added_permissions matches "{{added_permissions}}")
|count by content_name

|where if ("{{added_permissions}}" = "*", true, added_permissions matches "{{added_permissions}}")
|count by added_permission_to

_view=sumologic_audit _sourceCategory=user_activity
| where action ="MANAGE_PERMISSIONS"

children.name: Scheduled Search - Search Triggered Summary
children.description: See all webhook and scheduled search triggerings.
children.title: Scheduled Search - Search Triggered Summary

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH triggered
| parse "[AlertType=*]" as type nodrop
| parse "[Destination=*]" as destination nodrop
| parse "[Name=*]" as name nodrop
| count as count by destination
| sort count

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH ("Scheduled search alert triggered")
| parse "[Name=*]" as SavedSearchName
| parse "[AlertType=*]" as AlertType nodrop
| timeslice 1h
| count by SavedSearchName, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column SavedSearchName

panels.title: TimeCompare Count of All Alerts Triggered

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH ("Scheduled search alert triggered") 
| timeslice 15m
| count by _timeslice | compare with timeshift 1d 7

_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH ("Scheduled search alert triggered")
| parse "[Name=*]" as SavedSearchName
| parse "[AlertType=*]" as AlertType nodrop
| count by SavedSearchName
| sort by _count

_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH ("Scheduled search alert triggered")
| parse "[Name=*]" as SavedSearchName

| parse "[AlertType=*]" as AlertType nodrop
| timeslice 1d
| count by AlertType, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column AlertType

_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH ("Scheduled search alert triggered")
| parse "[Destination=*]" as Destination
| parse "[StatusCode=*]" as Status_Code
| parse "[Name=*]" as SavedSearchName
| parse "[AlertType=*]" as AlertType nodrop
| count by Destination
| sort by _count

panels.title: Count Of Status Codes For Webhooks

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH ("Scheduled search alert triggered")
| parse "[StatusCode=*]" as Status_Code
| parse "[Name=*]" as SavedSearchName
| parse "[AlertType=*]" as AlertType nodrop
| count by Status_Code
| sort by _count

_index=sumologic_audit and _sourceName=SCHEDULED_SEARCH ("Scheduled search alert triggered")
| parse "[StatusCode=*]" as Status_Code
| parse "[Name=*]" as SavedSearchName
| parse "[AlertType=*]" as AlertType nodrop
| where !(Status_Code matches "2*")
| count by SavedSearchName, Status_Code
| sort by _count

children.name: Throttling events - Log Ingest
children.description: Throttling events are reported when:  1.At least 15 minutes has elapsed since the last time a throttling event was reported. AND 2.At least 2 percent of collector sources experienced the effect of data throttling in the time interval.

children.name: Throttling events - Metrics Ingest
children.description: Throttling events are reported when:  1.At least 15 minutes has elapsed since the last time a throttling event was reported. AND 2.At least 2 percent of collector sources experienced the effect of data throttling in the time interval.

children.name: User Activity - Login and Credentials
children.description: See logins, location of logged in users, and count of login attempts, password changes, and password resets
children.title: User Activity - Login and Credentials

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit action=login status=SUCCESS
| where _sourceCategory="user_activity"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = _sourceHost 
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code 
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit class=PASSWORD action=RESET
| where _sourceCategory="user_activity"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, status
| transpose row _timeslice column status

_index=sumologic_audit action=login status=SUCCESS
| where _sourceCategory="user_activity"
| withtime _messageTime
| most_recent(_messageTime_withtime) as last_login by sourceuser,_sourceHost
| formatDate(fromMillis(last_login), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss.SSS", "UTC") as last_login
| _sourceHost as Host
| fields -_sourceHost
| fields sourceuser, host, last_login
| sort by last_login

_index=sumologic_audit class=PASSWORD action=MODIFY
| where _sourceCategory="user_activity"
| timeslice 1d
| count by _timeslice, status
| transpose row _timeslice column status

_index=sumologic_audit action=login status=SUCCESS
| where _sourceCategory="user_activity" 
| timeslice by 1d
| count as count by _timeslice

children.name: User Activity - Scheduled Search
children.description: See a count of scheduled searches that were started, completed, finished with errors, timed-out, skipped, or suspended.
children.title: User Activity - Scheduled Search

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=START
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| timeslice 1h
| count_distinct(sourceuser) as count by _timeslice

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=FINISH status=FAILURE
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search" 
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| count

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=SUSPEND
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId"
| count

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=START
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| timeslice 1h
| count as count by _timeslice, status
| transpose row _timeslice column status

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=TIMEOUT status=FAILURE
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| count

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search (action=CREATE or action=UPDATE or action=DELETE)
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| timeslice 12h
| count by _timeslice, action
| transpose row _timeslice column action

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search (action=TIMEOUT or action=SUSPEND or action=SKIP or status=FAILURE)
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| count as count by SchTime, Name, SchSearchId, sourceuser, action, status | sort by SchTime | limit 10
| fields -count

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=SUSPEND
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId"
| count as count by _messagetime, Name, SchSearchId, sourceuser
| sort by _messagetime
| formatDate(fromMillis(_messagetime), "MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss.SSS", "UTC") as time
| fields -count,_messagetime
| fields time,name,SchSearchId, sourceuser

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=FINISH
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| timeslice 1h
| count as count by _timeslice,status
| transpose row _timeslice column status

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search action=SKIP
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| count

_index=sumologic_audit class=scheduled_search (action=TIMEOUT or action=SUSPEND or action=SKIP or status=FAILURE)
| where _sourceCategory="scheduled_search"
| KV "Name", "SchSearchId", "SchTime"
| count as count by Name, SchSearchId, sourceuser | sort by count | limit 10

children.name: Data Volume
children.description: Data Volume

children.name: Data Volume - Capacity Utilization
children.description: The Data Volume - Capacity Utilization dashboard provides views of subscribed, actual, and percentage capacity utilization for logs and metrics.
children.title: Data Volume - Capacity Utilization

panels.title: Notes
panels.text:
- The "Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity" and "Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity" values needs to be configured based on Account Subscription.
    If you have  Credit based plan , please check with your account executive to determine these values  for your account.
   Otherwise , see Administration > Account > Account Overview to get your Capacity Values.

    Configure the " Daily Log Ingest Capacity"  and  "Metric DPM Ingest Capacity" values in the dashboard filters

- Tracing is a credits-based model only and does not support the concept of ingest capacity .

- Your account is probably experiencing account overages if you see "Log Ingest Capacity Utilization" and or "DPM Ingest Capacity Utilization" panel showing more than 100%.

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory="collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
| where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as ingest_gbytes
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60*60*24)) as duration_in_day
| ingest_gbytes / duration_in_day as %"AvgLogIngestPerDay"
| {{Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity}} as %"DailyLogIngestCapacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| fields %"DailyLogIngestCapacity"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory="collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
| where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as ingest_gbytes
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60*60*24)) as duration_in_day
| ingest_gbytes / duration_in_day as %"AvgLogIngestPerDay"
| fields %"AvgLogIngestPerDay"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory="collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
| where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as ingest_gbytes
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60*60*24)) as duration_in_day
| ingest_gbytes / duration_in_day as %"AvgLogIngestPerDay"
| {{Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity}} as %"DailyLogIngestCapacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| (%"AvgLogIngestPerDay"/%"DailyLogIngestCapacity")*100 as %"LogIngest_Capacity_Utilization"
| fields %"LogIngest_Capacity_Utilization"

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm 
| {{Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity}} as %"DPM_Capacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| fields -datapoints, duration_in_min, dpm

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm 
| fields -datapoints, duration_in_min

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm 
| {{Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity}} as %"DPM_Capacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| (dpm/%"DPM_Capacity")*100 as %"DPM_Capacity_Utilization"
| fields -datapoints, duration_in_min, dpm, %"DPM_Capacity"

children.name: Data Volume - Log Spikes
children.description: The Data Volume - Log Spikes Dashboard helps you quickly identify large increases in data ingested for logs.
children.title: Data Volume - Log Spikes

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where   dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| timeslice 1d
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice
| outlier gbytes

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Mi as mbytes
| timeslice 1h
| sum(mbytes) as mbytes by _timeslice
| predict mbytes by 1h model=ar, forecast=20
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)
| fields - mbytes_error

panels.title: Top Ingest Spikes Over the Past Day

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| timeslice 1d
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice, collector
| sort _timeslice desc, gbytes desc
| 1 as rownum
| accum rownum by _timeslice
| where _accum <= 5 // limit by this
| fields _timeslice, gbytes, collector
| transpose row _timeslice column collector

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| timeslice 1d
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice, collector
| compare with timeshift 1d
| sort _timeslice desc, gbytes desc
| 1 as rownum
| accum rownum by _timeslice
| where _accum <= 5 // limit by this
| fields _timeslice, gbytes, gbytes_1d, collector
| if (!(isNull(gbytes_1d)), ((gbytes - gbytes_1d) / gbytes_1d) * 100, gbytes * 100) as percent_diff
| if (isNull(gbytes_1d), 0, gbytes_1d) as gbytes_1d
| where percent_diff > 0
| sort percent_diff
| limit 5
| fields _timeslice, collector, gbytes, gbytes_1d,percent_diff

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "sourcecategory_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
|where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| timeslice 1d
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice, sourceCategory
| sort _timeslice desc, gbytes desc
| 1 as rownum
| accum rownum by _timeslice
| where _accum <= 5 // limit by this
| fields _timeslice, gbytes, sourceCategory
| transpose row _timeslice column sourceCategory

children.name: Data Volume - Logs
children.description: Data Volume - Logs dashboard allows you to view your log ingest volume by tier , by  ingest spikes, outliers, and quota.
children.title: Data Volume - Logs

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Mi as mbytes
| timeslice 1h
| sum(mbytes) as curr_hrs_mbytes by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc 
| diff curr_hrs_mbytes
| where !isNull(_diff)
| (_diff+curr_hrs_mbytes) as prev_hrs_mbytes
| ((_diff / curr_hrs_mbytes) * 100) as pct_incr
| 50 as spikePercent
| where (-1 * pct_incr) > spikePercent
| abs(pct_incr) as pct_incr
| fields _timeslice, curr_hrs_mbytes, prev_hrs_mbytes, pct_incr

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes
| timeslice 1d
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Mi as mbytes
| timeslice 1d
| sum(mbytes) as mbytes by _timeslice
| outlier mbytes

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Mi as mbytes
| timeslice 1h
| sum(mbytes) as mbytes by _timeslice
| predict mbytes by 1h model=ar, forecast=20
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)
| fields - mbytes_error

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| timeslice 1d
| sum(gbytes) as daily_ingest_gbytes by _timeslice
| {{Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity}} as daily_log_ingest_capacity // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview.

panels.title: Note: Daily Ingest Capacity
panels.text:
The  Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity value needs to be configured based on Account Subscription. 
If you have Credit based plan , please check with your account executive to determine these values for your account.
Otherwise , see Administration > Account > Account Overview to get your Capacity Values.

Configure the "Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity" in the dashboard filter.

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="view_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as index, dataTier, bytes, count
| where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| where index not in ("Default Index", "sumologic_volume", "sumologic_audit")
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by index
| top 5 index by gbytes

_index=sumologic_volume sizeInBytes  _sourceCategory = "view_and_tier_volume" 
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as view_name, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| where view_name not in ("sumologic_volume", "sumologic_audit")
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| timeslice 1d
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice, view_name
| transpose row _timeslice column view_name

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="sourcecategory_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by sourcecategory
| round(gbytes,2) as gbytes
| total gbytes as tot_gbytes 
| round(tot_gbytes,2) as tot_gbytes
| (gbytes*100/tot_gbytes) as pct_total 
| round(pct_total,2) as pct_total 
| where pct_total >= 1 and pct_total <= 30 // candidates for partition
| sort pct_total

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="sourcecategory_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes
| timeslice 1d
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice, sourcecategory
| total gbytes as tot_gbytes by _timeslice
| (gbytes*100/tot_gbytes) as pct_total 
| where pct_total >= 1 and pct_total <= 30 // candidates for partition
| count by _timeslice

_index=sumologic_volume  _sourceCategory = "sourcecategory_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by sourcecategory
| round(gbytes,2) as gbytes
| total gbytes as tot_gbytes 
| round(tot_gbytes,2) as tot_gbytes
| (gbytes*100/tot_gbytes) as pct_total 
| round(pct_total,2) as pct_total
| 30 as threshold
| where pct_total > threshold
| sort pct_total

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60*60*24)) as duration_in_day
| gbytes / duration_in_day as %"GB/Day"
| fields %"GB/Day"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume" 
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as daily_ingest_gbytes

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="view_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as index, dataTier, bytes, count
| where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| where index ="Default Index"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by index
| top 5 index by gbytes

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume" 
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
|where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| timeslice 24h
| sum(gbytes) as daily_ingest_gbytes by _timeslice
| where daily_ingest_gbytes>{{Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity}}
| count

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory = "collector_and_tier_volume"
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
| timeslice 1m
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice
// predict for next 15 days using auto-regressive model
| predict gbytes by 1m model=ar, forecast=1440m 
| sum (gbytes_predicted)

children.name: Data Volume - Metrics
children.description: The Data Volume - Metrics dashboard allows you to view your metrics ingested, identifies ingest outliers/spikes as well as helps predict what ingestion is going to be.
children.title: Data Volume - Metrics

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1d
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| fields - datapoints, duration_in_min

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume" datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by collector
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| top 5 collector by %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="sourcecategory_metrics_volume" datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by sourcecategory
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| top 5 sourcecategory by %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="sourcehost_metrics_volume" datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcehost>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| where sourcehost !="Unknown"
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by sourcehost
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| top 5 sourcehost by %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="source_metrics_volume" datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<source>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by source
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| top 5 source by %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 6h
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| outlier %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 6h
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| predict  %"DPM"  by 1h model=ar, forecast=20
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)
| fields - datapoints, DPM_error, duration_in_min

panels.title: Daily Ingest Vs Average Daily Ingest Capacity

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1d
| sum(datapoints) as daily_ingest_datapoints by _timeslice
| {{Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity}} as DPM_Capacity // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| DPM_Capacity * 60 * 24 as DataPoint_Capacity // Set this calculated value through gear icon for "Colors by Value Range..."
| fields -DPM_Capacity

panels.title: Note
panels.text:
The " Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity" values needs to be configured based on Account Subscription.
- If you have  Credit based plan , please check with your account executive to determine these values for your account.
- Otherwise , see Administration > Account > Account Overview to determine what your ingest for metrics is.


Configure the "Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity" value in the dashboard filter.

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| datapoints/1000 as ThousandDataPoints
| fields ThousandDataPoints

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume" dataPoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| datapoints/1000 as ThousandDataPoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| ThousandDataPoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| fields %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume  _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 6h
| sum(datapoints) as daily_ingest_datapoints by _timeslice
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| daily_ingest_datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| compare timeshift 1d
| fields - daily_ingest_datapoints, daily_ingest_datapoints_1d, duration_in_min, duration_in_min_1d

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 24h
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by  _timeslice
| where datapoints>{{Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity}}*60*24
| count

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1m
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by  _timeslice
| predict datapoints by 1m model=ar, forecast=1440m 
| sum (datapoints_predicted) as datapoints_predicted
//| datapoints_predicted/1000 as datapoints_predicted
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints_predicted / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| fields %"DPM"

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=*_metrics_volume | parse field=_sourcecategory "*_metrics_volume" as metricsview
| count by metricsview

children.title: Data Volume - Overview

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{LogView}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
| where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes | sum(gbytes) as gbytes by collector
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60*60*24)) as duration_in_day
| gbytes / duration_in_day as %"GB/Day"
| top 5 collector by %"GB/Day"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by collector
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| top 5 collector by %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{LogView}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
| where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60*60*24)) as duration_in_day
| gbytes / duration_in_day as %"GB/Day"
| fields %"GB/Day"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{LogView}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
| where  dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume dataPoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| datapoints/1000 as datapoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as %"DPM" 
| fields %"DPM"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| datapoints/1000 as ThousandDataPoints
| fields ThousandDataPoints

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume 
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum(billedBytes) as billedBytes by collector
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| billedBytes / duration_in_min as % "billedBytes per minute"
| top 5 collector by % "billedBytes per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume 
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum(billedBytes) as %"billedBytes"
| billedBytes/1Gi AS BilledGBytes
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| BilledGBytes / duration_in_min as %"Billed GBytes per min" 
| fields %"Billed GBytes per min"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume 
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(billedBytes) as %"billedBytes"
| billedBytes/1Gi as BilledGBytes
| fields BilledGBytes

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{LogView}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes | sum(gbytes) as gbytes by dataTier

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{LogView}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
| where dataTier matches "{{Tier}}"
| bytes/1Gi as gbytes | sum(gbytes) as gbytes by collector

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{MetricsView}}_metrics_volume datapoints
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by collector

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume 
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum(billedBytes) as billedBytes by collector

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=*_and_tier_volume | parse field=_sourcecategory "*_and_tier_volume" as logview
| count by logview

children.name: Data Volume - Tracing
children.description: The Data Volume - Tracing dashboard provides views of your Tracing data ingest by billed bytes and span counts per minute.
children.title: Data Volume - Tracing

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume
| parse regex "\"(?<field_type>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1d
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice, field_type
| %"{{Unit}}"  as %"{{Unit}} Count"
| fields -%"{{Unit}}"
| transpose row _timeslice column field_type

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="collector_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by collector
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "Billion {{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 collector by % "Billion {{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="sourcecategory_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<sourcecategory>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by sourcecategory
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "Billion {{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 sourcecategory by % "Billion {{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="sourcehost_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<sourceHost>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by sourceHost
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "{{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 sourceHost by % "{{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="source_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<source>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by source
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "{{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 source by % "{{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 6h
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
|outlier %"{{Unit}}"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1h
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
| predict %"{{Unit}}" by 1h model=ar, forecast=20
| fillmissing timeslice(1h)
| fields - {{Unit}}_error

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="sourcename_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<sourceName>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by sourceName
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "{{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 sourceName by % "{{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="service_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<source>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by source
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "{{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 source by % "{{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory={{TracingView}}_tracing_volume
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 5m
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
| compare timeshift 1d

_index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory="collector_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1h
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc 
| diff %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}"
| where !isNull(_diff)
| (_diff+%"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}") as %"prev_hrs_{{Unit}}"
| ((_diff / %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}") * 100) as pct_incr
| 50 as spikePercent
| where (-1 * pct_incr) > spikePercent
| abs(pct_incr) as pct_incr
| fields _timeslice, %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}", %"prev_hrs_{{Unit}}", pct_incr

_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_tracing_volume
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1m
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
| predict %"{{Unit}}" by 1m model=ar, forecast=1440
| sum  ({{Unit}}_predicted) as {{Unit}}_predicted
|if("{{Unit}}" matches "spansCount", 1000000, 1Gi) as denominator 
| {{Unit}}_predicted/denominator as {{Unit}}_predicted
| fields - denominator

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=*_tracing_volume | parse field=_sourcecategory "*_tracing_volume" as tracingview
| count by tracingview

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Cloud SIEM
children.description: Sumo Logic App for Enterprise Audit - Cloud SIEM provides the oversight, trending, and analysis for the Cloud SIEM Enterprise (CSE) set of features in the Sumo platform. It allows users to drill into the data and audit logs of Cloud SIEM Enterprise.

children.name: Cloud SIEM - Rules and Mapping Changes
children.description: View changes to CSE rules and mappings using audit event data.
children.title: Cloud SIEM - Rules and Mapping Changes

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse*) 
OR
(_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )
*rule*

{{{keywords}}}

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Rule*"
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as operator nodrop
| json field=_raw "from" nodrop
| json field=_raw "to" nodrop

| json field=_raw "templatedMatchRule" as rulea nodrop
| json field=_raw "matchRule" as ruleb nodrop
| json field=_raw "yaraRule" as rulec nodrop
| json field=_raw "thresholdRule" as ruled nodrop
| json field=_raw "chainRule" as rulee nodrop
| json field=_raw "aggregationRule" as rulef nodrop

| rulea as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruleb,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulec,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruled,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulee,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulef,rule) as rule

//| where isempty(rule)

| json field=rule "readableId" as id
| json field=rule "name"
| json field=rule "enabled"
| json field=rule "expression"
| json field=rule "severityMapping"
| json field=rule "tuningExpressions"
| json field=rule "isPrototype"
| json field=rule "tags"
| count as events,values(eventname) as eventnames by id,name // tuningexpressions
 | sort name asc

(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse*) 
OR
(_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )
*rule*

{{{keywords}}}

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Rule*"
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as operator nodrop
| json field=_raw "from" nodrop
| json field=_raw "to" nodrop

| json field=_raw "templatedMatchRule" as rulea nodrop
| json field=_raw "matchRule" as ruleb nodrop
| json field=_raw "yaraRule" as rulec nodrop
| json field=_raw "thresholdRule" as ruled nodrop
| json field=_raw "chainRule" as rulee nodrop
| json field=_raw "aggregationRule" as rulef nodrop

| rulea as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruleb,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulec,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruled,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulee,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulef,rule) as rule

//| where isempty(rule)

| json field=rule "readableId" as id
| json field=rule "name"
| json field=rule "enabled"
| json field=rule "expression"
| json field=rule "severityMapping"
| json field=rule "tuningExpressions"
| json field=rule "isPrototype"
| json field=rule "tags"
| formatdate(tolong(_messagetime),"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm") as time
| sort _messagetime
| first(time) as time,max(_messagetime) as _messagetime,first(enabled) as enabled, first(isPrototype) as isPrototype by id,name 
| where enabled = "false" or isprototype = "true" //,expression,tags //,from,to  // tuningexpressions
| sort _messagetime  | fields -_messagetime //| where enabled = "

(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse*) 
OR
(_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )
*RuleDeleted

{{{keywords}}}

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Rule*"
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as operator nodrop
| json field=_raw "from" nodrop
| json field=_raw "to" nodrop

| json field=_raw "templatedMatchRule" as rulea nodrop
| json field=_raw "matchRule" as ruleb nodrop
| json field=_raw "yaraRule" as rulec nodrop
| json field=_raw "thresholdRule" as ruled nodrop
| json field=_raw "chainRule" as rulee nodrop
| json field=_raw "aggregationRule" as rulef nodrop

| rulea as rule

| if(isempty(rule),rulec,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruled,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulee,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulef,rule) as rule

//| where isempty(rule)

| json field=rule "readableId" as id
| json field=rule "name"
| json field=rule "enabled"
| json field=rule "expression"
| json field=rule "severityMapping"
| json field=rule "tuningExpressions"
| json field=rule "isPrototype"
| json field=rule "tags"
| formatdate(tolong(_messagetime),"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm") as time
| count by time,_messagetime,id,name,operator | fields -_count // tuningexpressions
| sort _messagetime  | fields -_messagetime

(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse*) 
OR
(_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )
*RuleCreated

{{{keywords}}}

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Rule*"

| json field=_raw "templatedMatchRule" as rulea nodrop

panels.title: About
panels.text:
Use this dashboard to review changes to your CSE rule set. 

For the release history of Sumo Logic managed content changes see: https://help.sumologic.com/Release-Notes/Cloud_SIEM_Enterprise_Release_Notes

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse*) 
OR
(_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )

*Mapping*

{{{keywords}}}

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Mapping*"
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as operator nodrop
| json field=_raw "from" as old nodrop
| json field=_raw "to" as new nodrop

| json field=_raw "logMapping"

//
| json field=logMapping "id" 
| json field=logMapping "name"
| json field=logMapping "source"
| json field=logMapping "recordType"
| json field=logMapping "enabled"
| json field=logMapping "vendor"
| json field=logMapping "product"
| json field=logMapping "fields" nodrop

| formatdate(tolong(_messagetime),"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm") as time
| count by time,_messagetime,eventname,id,name,enabled,source,recordtype,vendor,product,fields | fields -_count // tuningexpressions
| sort _messagetime  | fields -_messagetime

(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse*) 
OR
(_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )
(*Rule* or *Mapping*)

*

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Rule*" or eventname matches "*Mapping*"
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as operator nodrop

| timeslice 1d
|count by _timeslice, eventname 
| fillmissing timeslice, values all in eventname
| transpose row _timeslice column eventname

children.name: Health Monitoring
children.description: This folder has dashboards related to CSE Health.

children.name: Cloud SIEM - Data Parsing & Mapping Monitoring
CSE Failed Records Details (parsing or mapping issue)

search.queryText:
_index=sec_record_failure AND objectType=FailedRecord
| json "reason" nodrop
| first(metadata_sourceMessageId) as latest_message, count as Total by metadata_sourceCategory, metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_deviceEventId, reason

| concat("https://","{{service_endpoint}}",".sumologic.com/ui/#/search/create?query=_messageId%3D", ToString(latest_message)) as url
| tourl(url, "Latest Message") as link

| order by Total
| fields -latest_message, url

queryParameters.name: service_endpoint
queryParameters.label: service_endpoint
queryParameters.description: Make sure to enter your service endpoint in the variable

children.name: Cloud SIEM - Failed Records Analysis
children.description: This dashboard provides summary on Failed Records.
children.title: Cloud SIEM - Failed Records Analysis

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record_failure objectType=FailedRecord metadata_sourceCategory={{{sourceCategory}}} metadata_vendor={{{vendor}}} metadata_product={{{product}}} metadata_deviceEventId={{{deviceEventId}}}
| limit 1000
| json field=_raw "reason" nodrop
| formatDate(_messageTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as date
| count as Total date, metadata_sourceMessageId, metadata_sourceCategory, metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_deviceEventId, reason
| order by date
| fields -Total

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice

panels.title: Events Trend by Vendor and Product

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record*
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, metadata_vendor, metadata_product
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_vendor, metadata_product

_index=sec_record* 
| where !(metadata_vendor = "UNKNOWN") 
| where objectType != "FailedRecord"
| count by objectType, metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_sourceCategory  
| sort by _count desc

_siemforward = "true" 
| count by _sourceCategory | sort by _count desc

_index=sec_record_failure
| json field=_raw "reason" as reason
| if (reason matches "*Parsers*", "failed_to_parse", reason) as reason
| count by reason, metadata_sourceCategory, metadata_vendor, metadata_product, metadata_deviceEventId  | sort by _count

_index=sec_record_failure
| json field=_raw "reason" as reason
| if (reason matches "*Parsers*", "failed_to_parse", reason) as reason
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, reason
| transpose row _timeslice column reason

_index=sec_signal 
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as fromState nodrop
| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as toState
| count by fromState, toState
| top 8 fromState, toState by _count

!(_siemforward = "true" )

| count by _sourceCategory 
 | sort by _count desc

_index=sec_record_failure objectType=FailedRecord 
| where !(metadata_vendor = "UNKNOWN") 
| json field=_raw "reason" nodrop
| values(metadata_sourceCategory) as metadata_sourceCategory, values(metadata_deviceEventId) as metadata_deviceEventId, count as Total metadata_vendor, metadata_product, reason
| order by Total

_index=sec_record*
| where !(metadata_vendor = "UNKNOWN") 
| where objectType = "FailedRecord"
| timeslice 1h
| count by _timeslice, metadata_vendor, metadata_product
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_vendor, metadata_product

_sourceCategory=* _siemForward=true
| where !isblank(_parser)
| count by _sourceCategory, _parser
| sort _count

_sourceCategory=* _siemForward=true
| where isblank(_parser)
| "NOT CONFIGURED" as _parser
| count by _sourceCategory, _parser
| sort _count

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record_failure*
| timeslice 15m
//| count by metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason", _timeslice
| count by %"fields.reason", _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column %"fields.reason"

_index=sec_record_failure*
| timeslice 15m
//| count by metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason", _timeslice
| count by metadata_sourceCategory, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_sourceCategory

_index=sec_record_failure*
| count as today by metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason"
//| sort _count
| compare with timeshift 1d 1 as vs_yesterday
| concat("https://","{{service_endpoint}}",".sumologic.com/ui/#/search/create?query=_sourceCategory%3D%3Cmy_sc%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%5Bsubquery%3A%20_index%3Dsec_record_failure*%20metadata_sourceCategory%3D%3Cmy_sc%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20count%20by%20metadata_sourceMessageId%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20metadata_sourceMessageId%20as%20_messageId%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20compose%20_messageId%20maxResults%3D10000%5D%0A%7C%20_size%20as%20bytes%0A%7C%20timeslice%201s%0A%7C%20count%20by%20_timeslice%2C%20_messageId%2C%20bytes%2C%20_sourceCategory%2C%20_raw%20%0A%7C%20sort%20by%20_timeslice&startTime=-15m&endTime=-10m") as url
| replace(url,"%3Cmy_sc%3E",metadata_sourceCategory) as url
| toURL(url,"show_failed_events") as show_failed_events
| fields metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason", today, today_vs_yesterday,show_failed_events
| sort today

_index=sec_record_failure*
| count by %"fields.reason"
| sort _count

_index=sec_record_failure*
| count by metadata_sourceCategory
| sort _count

children.name: Cloud SIEM - Rule Overview
children.description: Look in depth at a CSE rule to assist with rule tuning.
children.title: Cloud SIEM - Rule Overview

panels.title: About
panels.text:
Use this dashboard to see information in insights, signals, and records that pertain to a specific rule. 

The typical use case for this dashboard is to filter by rule keyword to one or more specific rules to:
-  determine how the rule is impacting the generation of signals
- what are the top entities, source record types, or deviceventids that might be reviewed to create tuning config (such as tuning expressions, match list updates or entity group configuration).
- what source record metadata results in signal generation.

Filter this dashboard to a specific rule using the rule id or a keyword string identifying the rule name. This is applied as a keyword search to the base searches.

panels.title: Signals
panels.text: Matching data in sec_signal index. Use these panels to understand how many signals are generated and suppressed and which entities, and mapping metadata (such as product, vendor etc) generate signals.

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed

| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_parser" as parser nodrop
| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule

| parse regex field=tags "\"(?<tagname>[^:\"]+):(?<tagvalue>[^:\"]+)" multi

| max(severity) as max_sev,count_distinct(entityid) as entities,count_distinct(rule) as rules by tagname,tagvalue

_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| where !(isempty(suppressedReasons))

| timeslice  | count as suppressed  by _timeslice | compare with timeshift 7d

_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid
| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed="YES"

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule
| parse regex field=suppressedreasons "\"(?<suppress_by>[^\":\[\]]+)" multi
| count_distinct(id) as suppressed_signals,values(suppress_by) as reasons by entityid | sort suppressed_signals

_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid
| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed="YES"

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule
| parse regex field=suppressedreasons "\"(?<suppress_by>[^\":\[\]]+)" multi
| count_distinct(entityid) as entities,count_distinct(id) as suppressed_signals by suppress_by

(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse* 
OR
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )
*Rule*

{{{rule}}}
//THRESHOLD-S00096

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Rule*"
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as operator nodrop
| json field=_raw "from" as old nodrop
| json field=_raw "to" as new nodrop

| json field=_raw "templatedMatchRule" as rulea nodrop
| json field=_raw "matchRule" as ruleb nodrop
| json field=_raw "yaraRule" as rulec nodrop
| json field=_raw "thresholdRule" as ruled nodrop
| json field=_raw "chainRule" as rulee nodrop
| json field=_raw "aggregationRule" as rulef nodrop

| rulea as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruleb,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulec,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruled,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulee,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulef,rule) as rule

//| where isempty(rule)

| json field=rule "readableId" as id
| json field=rule "name"
| json field=rule "enabled"
| json field=rule "expression"
| json field=rule "severityMapping"
| json field=rule "tuningExpressions"
| json field=rule "isPrototype"
| json field=rule "tags"
| formatdate(tolong(_messagetime),"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm") as time
| count by time,_messagetime,eventname,id,name,enabled,isPrototype,operator,expression,severitymapping,tuningexpressions,tags, old,new | fields -_count // tuningexpressions
| where id matches /(?i){{{rule}}}/
| sort _messagetime  | fields -_messagetime

sourceDefinition.query: _index=sec_signal | count by ruleid | sort ruleid asc

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_*_events AND _sourceCategory=cseInsight AND "{{ID}}"
| json "insight.readableId" nodrop
| where %"insight.readableId" = "{{ID}}"
| limit 1

| json "insight.status" as status nodrop

| toUpperCase(status) as status

| count as Total status
| status as Total

_index=sumologic_*_events AND _sourceCategory=cseInsight AND "{{ID}}"
| json "insight.readableId" nodrop
| where %"insight.readableId" = "{{ID}}"
| limit 1
