panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"titleFontSize":0,"labelFontSize":10,"title":"rule_name","labelMaxWidth":250,"labelWrap":false},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":10,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#EBEFF2","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#EBEFF2","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":10,"tickColor":"#344666","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#344666","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"series":{},"general":{"type":"bar","displayType":"default","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"distribution"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"overrides":[],"legend":{"enabled":false}}

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_signal 
 {{{keywords}}}
 
| where !(isempty(suppressedreasons))
| if (isempty(suppressedReasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed = "YES"
| if (suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated
| sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed by ruleName | sort by suppressed

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard shows an overview and some detailed tabular views for reflected CSE Signal events, specifically mapping, parsers and suppression.

The data source is the sec_signal index.

For more help on signal suppression reasons and configuration see: https://help.sumologic.com/Cloud_SIEM_Enterprise/Records%2C_Signals%2C_Entities%2C_and_Insights/About_Signal_Suppression

Version: 20220830

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_signal 
 {{{keywords}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedReasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed = "YES"
| if (suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| timeslice  | sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed  by _timeslice | compare with timeshift 7d

_index=sec_signal
  {{{keywords}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed

| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule

| count_distinct(entityid) as entities,sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed,sum(is_generated) as generated by rule,product,vendor,mapperName,sourceCategory
| sort suppressed

_index=sec_signal
  {{{keywords}}}

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid
| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed="YES"
| parse regex field=fullrecords "\"active\":true,\"id\":\"[a-z0-9]*\",\"listId\":\"(?<listname>[^\"]*)\"" multi nodrop 

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule
| parse regex field=suppressedreasons "\"(?<suppress_by>[^\":\[\]]+)" multi
| count_distinct(id) as suppressed_signals,values(suppress_by) as reasons, values(listname) as listname by entityid,rule | sort suppressed_signals

_index=sec_signal 
 {{{keywords}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedReasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed = "NO"
| if (suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| timeslice  | sum(is_generated) as generated  by _timeslice | compare with timeshift 7d

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Collector & Data Forwarding Management
children.description: Enterprise Audit - Collector & Data Forwarding Management

children.name: Collector Management
children.description: Collector Management is a collection of dashboards that provide at-a-glance data on collector activities such as creating, updating, and deleting collectors. Data for creating, updating, and deleting collector sources is also provided in the Collector Management dashboard set.

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Collector Activities
children.description: Collector Activities DashBoard provides detailed information on collector activities, such as top users by activity and a one-day time comparison. You can also review data on recent collector activities and upgrades, and use pre-populated filters for a granular view of selected data.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Collector Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (ClobberCollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName="ClobberCollectorDeleted"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorType matches "{{CollectorType}}" and Interface matches "{{Interface}}"
|count by EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, CollectorName
| sort by EventTime
| fields - UserId, _count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from", "requestBy.userId", "requestBy.userEmail" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, requestByUserId, requestByUserEmail nodrop
| if(isNull(UserEmail), if(isNull(requestByUserEmail), UserId, requestByUserEmail), UserEmail) as User
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "ClobberCollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorType matches "{{CollectorType}}" and Interface matches "{{Interface}}"
| count as Count by User, EventName
| transpose row User column EventName as %"CollectorCreated", %"CollectorUpdated", %"CollectorDeleted", %"CollectorUpgradeCompleted", %"ClobberCollectorDeleted"
| sort by CollectorCreated, CollectorUpdated, CollectorDeleted, CollectorUpgradeCompleted, ClobberCollectorDeleted
| limit 5

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted")
| json field=CurrentValue "ephemeral", "sourceSyncMode", "collectorType" as UpdatedIsEphermal, UpdatedSourceSyncMode, UpdatedCollectorType nodrop
| if(isNull(IsEphemeral), if(isNull(UpdatedIsEphermal), "-", UpdatedIsEphermal) , IsEphemeral) as IsEphemeral
| if(isNull(SourceSyncMode), if(isNull(UpdatedSourceSyncMode), "-", UpdatedSourceSyncMode) , SourceSyncMode) as SourceSyncMode
| if(isNull(CollectorType), if(isNull(UpdatedCollectorType), "-", UpdatedCollectorType) , CollectorType) as CollectorType
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorType matches "{{CollectorType}}" and Interface matches "{{Interface}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, Interface, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp
| sort by EventTime
| fields - UserId, _count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from", "requestedBy", "fromVersion", "toVersion", "status" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, RequestedBy, FromVersion, ToVersion, UpgradeStatus nodrop
| where EventName="CollectorUpgradeCompleted"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorType matches "{{CollectorType}}" and Interface matches "{{Interface}}"
| count by EventTime, UserId, RequestedBy, CollectorName, FromVersion, ToVersion, UpgradeStatus
| sort by EventTime
| fields - UserId, _count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeRequested OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from", "requestBy.userId", "requestBy.userEmail" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, requestByUserId, requestByUserEmail nodrop
| if(isNull(UserEmail), if(isNull(requestByUserEmail), UserId, requestByUserEmail), UserEmail) as User
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "EphemeralCollectorDeleted", "ClobberCollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeRequested", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorType matches "{{CollectorType}}" and Interface matches "{{Interface}}"
| count by UserIp
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip = UserIp
| sum(_count) as count by latitude, longitude

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeRequested OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorType matches "{{CollectorType}}" and Interface matches "{{Interface}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted") in EventName 
| compare timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeRequested OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by CollectorType

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeRequested OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "operator.interface", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "collector.ephemeral", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "collector.collectorType",  "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, Interface, CollectorName, IsEphemeral, SourceSyncMode, CollectorType, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by Interface

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Collector Management Overview
children.description: Collector Management - Overview Dashboard provides a high-level view of trends related to collector and source activities, collector upgrade requests, upgrade successes and failures, the number of ephemeral collectors created and deleted, and the number of clobber collectors that were deleted.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Collector Management Overview

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted OR CollectorSourcesSynchronized)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted", "CollectorSourcesSynchronized")
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted", "CollectorSourcesSynchronized") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

panels.title: Distribution By Existing Source Sync Mode

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName", "collectorIdentity.collectorId", "collector.sourceSyncMode", "to.sourceSyncMode" as EventName, CollectorId, sourceSyncModeCreated, sourceSyncModeUpdated nodrop
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "EphemeralCollectorDeleted", "ClobberCollectorDeleted")
| if(isNull(sourceSyncModeCreated),if(isNull(sourceSyncModeUpdated),"-",sourceSyncModeUpdated),sourceSyncModeCreated) as sourceSyncModeCurrent
| withtime sourceSyncModeCurrent
| most_recent(sourceSyncModeCurrent_withtime) as SourceSyncMode by CollectorId
| where SourceSyncMode!="-"
| count as Count by SourceSyncMode

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated)
| json "eventName", "collector.ephemeral" as EventName, IsEphemeral nodrop
| where EventName="CollectorCreated" AND IsEphemeral="true"
| count as Count by IsEphemeral
| fillmissing values("true") in IsEphemeral

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName", "collectorIdentity.collectorId", "collector.collectorType", "to.collectorType" as EventName, CollectorId, CollectorTypeCreated, UpdatedCollectorType nodrop
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "EphemeralCollectorDeleted", "ClobberCollectorDeleted")
| if(isNull(CollectorTypeCreated),if(isNull(UpdatedCollectorType),"-",UpdatedCollectorType),CollectorTypeCreated) as CollectorTypeCurrent
| withtime CollectorTypeCurrent
| most_recent(CollectorTypeCurrent_withtime) as CollectorType by CollectorId
| where CollectorType!="-"
| count as Count by CollectorType

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where eventName in ("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted")
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

panels.title: Trend - Collector Upgrade Success vs Failure

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName in ("CollectorUpgradeCompleted")
| json "status" as Status
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, Status
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("SUCCESS", "FAILED") in Status
| transpose row _timeslice column Status

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.interface" as EventName, ActivityInterface nodrop
| where EventName in ("CollectorCreated","CollectorUpdated","CollectorDeleted")
| count as Count by ActivityInterface, EventName
| transpose row ActivityInterface column EventName
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorUpgradeRequested)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName="CollectorUpgradeRequested"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("CollectorUpgradeRequested") in EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (ClobberCollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName="ClobberCollectorDeleted"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("ClobberCollectorDeleted") in EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (EphemeralCollectorDeleted)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName="EphemeralCollectorDeleted"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("EphemeralCollectorDeleted") in EventName

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Collector Sources Activities
children.description: Collector Sources Activities DashBoard provides detailed information on created, updated and deleted sources, the top collectors where sources were added, active users, and one-day time comparisons. You can use pre-populated filters for a more granular view of selected data.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Collector Sources Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted", "CollectorSourcesSynchronized") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorName matches "{{CollectorName}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted", "CollectorSourcesSynchronized") in EventName 
| compare timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "sourceIdentity.sourceId", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceId, Source, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorName matches "{{CollectorName}}"
| if(isNull(Source), if (isNull(CurrentValue), "-", CurrentValue), Source) as Source
| withtime Source
| most_recent(Source_withtime) as SourceType by SourceId
| where SourceType != "-"
| count as Count by SourceType

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorName matches "{{CollectorName}}"
|count as Count by UserEmail, EventName
| transpose row UserEmail column EventName as %"SourceCreated", %"SourceUpdated", %"SourceDeleted"
| sort by SourceCreated, SourceUpdated, SourceDeleted
| limit 5

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted OR CollectorSourcesSynchronized)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted", "CollectorSourcesSynchronized") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorName matches "{{CollectorName}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted")
| json field=SourceDetails "sourceType" as SourceTypeCreated nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "sourceType" as SourceTypeUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(SourceTypeCreated), if(isNull(SourceTypeUpdated),"-",SourceTypeUpdated),SourceTypeCreated) as SourceType
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"  and CollectorName matches "{{CollectorName}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, SourceType, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CurrentValue, PreviousValue
| sort by EventTime
| fields -_count, PreviousValue, CurrentValue, userId, SourceDetails
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection SourceCreated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("SourceCreated", "SourceUpdated", "SourceDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and CollectorName matches "{{CollectorName}}"
| where EventName="SourceCreated"
|count as Count by CollectorName
| sort by Count
| limit 5

panels.title: Recent - Sources Added To Collector Using Local Configuration Management

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (CollectorSourcesSynchronized)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "collectorIdentity.collectorName", "sourcesAdded", "sourcesUpdated","sourcesDeleted",  "sourceIdentity.sourceName"  as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourcesAdded, SourcesUpdated, SourcesDeleted ,SourceName nodrop
| where EventName="CollectorSourcesSynchronized"
| parse field=SourcesAdded "[*]" as SourcesAdded nodrop
| replace(SourcesAdded, "\"", "") as SourcesAdded
| replace(SourcesAdded, "[]", "-") as SourcesAdded
| parse field=SourcesUpdated "[*]" as SourcesUpdated nodrop
| replace(SourcesUpdated, "\"", "") as SourcesUpdated
| replace(SourcesUpdated, "[]", "-") as SourcesUpdated
| parse field=SourcesDeleted "[*]" as SourcesDeleted nodrop
| replace(SourcesDeleted, "\"", "") as SourcesDeleted
| replace(SourcesDeleted, "[]", "-") as SourcesDeleted
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"  and CollectorName matches "{{CollectorName}}"
|count by EventTime, CollectorName, SourcesAdded, SourcesUpdated, SourcesDeleted, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, UserId
| limit 10

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "sourceIdentity.sourceId", "source.sourceType", "to.sourceType" as EventName, SourceId, Source, SourceTypeUpdated nodrop
| count by EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, UserEmail nodrop
| count by UserEmail

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by UserIp

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "sourceIdentity.collectorName", "sourceIdentity.sourceName", "source", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, UserEmail, userId, UserIp, CollectorName, SourceName, SourceDetails, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by CollectorName

children.name: Data Forwarding Management
children.description: Data Forwarding Management is a collection of dashboards focused on data for activities related to Data Forwarding to external servers. This includes data on collector forwarding destinations (Hitachi, SysLog, Generic REST) and index forwarding destinations (Amazon S3).

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Data Forwarding Destination Activities
children.description: Data Forwarding Destination Activities DashBoard provides detailed information on data forwarding destination activities. You can review trends for activities, their geographical locations, one-day times shift comparisons, user activity, and recent destination activities.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Data Forwarding Destination Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "operator.id", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp", "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "destination.destinationType","destination.enabled","destination.encrypted", "from", "to" as EventTime, eventName, UserId, User, UserIp, DestinationName, DataSourceType, DestinationType, Enabled, Encrypted, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated", "DataForwardingDestinationUpdated", "DataForwardingDestinationDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
|count as Count by EventName, User
| sort by Count
| transpose row User column EventName as %"DataForwardingDestinationCreated", %"DataForwardingDestinationUpdated", %"DataForwardingDestinationDeleted"
| sort by DataForwardingDestinationCreated, DataForwardingDestinationUpdated, DataForwardingDestinationDeleted 
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "operator.id", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp", "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "destination.destinationType","destination.enabled","destination.encrypted", "from", "to" as EventTime, eventName, UserId, User, UserIp, DestinationName, DataSourceType, DestinationType, Enabled, Encrypted, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated", "DataForwardingDestinationUpdated", "DataForwardingDestinationDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "operator.id", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp", "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "destination.destinationType","destination.enabled","destination.encrypted", "from", "to" as EventTime, eventName, UserId, User, UserIp, DestinationName, DataSourceType, DestinationType, Enabled, Encrypted, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated", "DataForwardingDestinationUpdated", "DataForwardingDestinationDeleted")
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("DataForwardingDestinationCreated","DataForwardingDestinationUpdated","DataForwardingDestinationDeleted") in EventName
| compare with timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "operator.id", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp", "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "destination.destinationType","destination.enabled","destination.encrypted", "from", "to" as EventTime, eventName, UserId, User, UserIp, DestinationName, DataSourceType, DestinationType, Enabled, Encrypted, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "destinationType", "enabled", "encrypted" as DestinationTypeUpdated, enabledUpdated, EncryptedUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(DestinationType), if(isNull(DestinationTypeUpdated), "-",DestinationTypeUpdated), DestinationType) as DestinationType
| if(isNull(Enabled), if(isNull(enabledUpdated), "-",enabledUpdated), Enabled) as Enabled
| if(isNull(Encrypted), if(isNull(EncryptedUpdated), "-",EncryptedUpdated), Encrypted) as Encrypted
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated", "DataForwardingDestinationUpdated", "DataForwardingDestinationDeleted") 
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
|count by EventTime, eventName, DestinationName, DataSourceType, DestinationType, Enabled, Encrypted, UserId, User, UserIp, PreviousValue, CurrentValue
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, UserId, PreviousValue, CurrentValue

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventTime", "eventName", "operator.id", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp", "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "destination.destinationType","destination.enabled","destination.encrypted", "from", "to" as EventTime, eventName, UserId, User, UserIp, DestinationName, DataSourceType, DestinationType, Enabled, Encrypted, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated", "DataForwardingDestinationUpdated", "DataForwardingDestinationDeleted") 
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("DataForwardingDestinationCreated","DataForwardingDestinationUpdated","DataForwardingDestinationDeleted") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

| json "eventTime", "eventName", "operator.id", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp", "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "destination.destinationType","destination.enabled","destination.encrypted", "from", "to" as EventTime, EventName, UserId, User, UserIp, DestinationName, DataSourceType, DestinationType, Enabled, Encrypted, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Data Forwarding Index Activities
children.description: Data Forwarding Index Activities DashBoard provides detailed information about data forwarding indexes that were created using partitions and scheduled views. You can review trends, geographical locations for data forwarding index activities, one-day time shift comparisons, user activities, as well as data on disabled indexes and recent index activities.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Data Forwarding Index Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| json field=dataForwarding "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "format" as NameCreated, SourceCreated, formatCreated nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "destinationIdentity.destinationName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType", "format" as NameUpdated, SourceUpdated, formatUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(NameCreated), if(isNull(NameUpdated), "-", NameUpdated), NameCreated) as DestinationName
| if(isNull(SourceCreated), if(isNull(SourceUpdated), "-", SourceUpdated), SourceCreated) as DataSourceType
| if(isNull(formatCreated), if(isNull(formatUpdated), "-", formatUpdated), formatCreated) as FormatType
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled", "DataForwardingForIndexUpdated", "DataForwardingForIndexDisabled")
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}"
|count by EventTime, EventName, IndexName, DestinationName, DataSourceType, FormatType, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, PreviousValue, CurrentValue, UserId,dataForwarding

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled", "DataForwardingForIndexUpdated", "DataForwardingForIndexDisabled") 
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled","DataForwardingForIndexUpdated","DataForwardingForIndexDisabled") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled", "DataForwardingForIndexUpdated", "DataForwardingForIndexDisabled")
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}"
|count as Count by EventName, User
| transpose row User column EventName as %"DataForwardingForIndexEnabled", %"DataForwardingForIndexUpdated", %"DataForwardingForIndexDisabled"
| sort by DataForwardingForIndexEnabled, DataForwardingForIndexUpdated, DataForwardingForIndexDisabled
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding DataForwardingForIndexDisabled
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName="DataForwardingForIndexDisabled"
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("DataForwardingForIndexDisabled") in EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled", "DataForwardingForIndexUpdated", "DataForwardingForIndexDisabled") 
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled", "DataForwardingForIndexUpdated", "DataForwardingForIndexDisabled")

| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled","DataForwardingForIndexUpdated","DataForwardingForIndexDisabled") in EventName
| compare with timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| count by EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| count by User

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "indexName", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "dataForwarding", "from", "to" as EventName, EventTime, IndexName, User, UserId, UserIp, dataForwarding, PreviousValue, CurrentValue nodrop
| count by UserIp

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Data Forwarding Management Overview
children.description: Data Forwarding Management - Overview DashBoard provides an at-a-glance view of trends for destination types and the distribution of destination types, such as  Amazon S3, hitachi, Syslog, and Generic REST. Visual representations for the distribution of data forwarding destinations and data forwarding indexes are also shown.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Data Forwarding Management Overview

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated", "DataForwardingDestinationUpdated", "DataForwardingDestinationDeleted")
| count as Count by EventName

panels.title: Distribution Of Existing Status for Amazon S3 Data Forwarding

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventName", "destinationIdentity.destinationId", "destination.enabled", "to.enabled" as EventName, destinationId, CreatedEnabled,UpdatedEnabled nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated","DataForwardingDestinationUpdated","DataForwardingDestinationDeleted")
| if(isNull(CreatedEnabled), if(isNull(UpdatedEnabled), "-",UpdatedEnabled), CreatedEnabled) as CurrentEnabled 
| withtime CurrentEnabled
| most_recent(CurrentEnabled_withtime) as Enabled by destinationId
| where Enabled!="-"
| if (Enabled matches "true", "Active", "InActive") as Status
| count as Count by Status

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding DataForwardingDestinationCreated
| json "eventName", "destinationIdentity.dataSourceType" as EventName, DataSourceType nodrop
| where EventName="DataForwardingDestinationCreated"
| count as Count by DataSourceType

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding DataForwardingDestinationCreated
| json "eventName", "destination.destinationType" as EventName, DestinationType nodrop
| where EventName="DataForwardingDestinationCreated"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, DestinationType
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("Amazon S3","Syslog","Hitachi", "Rest") in DestinationType
| transpose row _timeslice column DestinationType

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled" ,"DataForwardingForIndexUpdated" ,"DataForwardingForIndexDisabled")
| count as Count by EventName

panels.title: Distribution Of Existing Format Type For Data Forwarding

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingForIndexEnabled OR DataForwardingForIndexUpdated OR DataForwardingForIndexDisabled)
| json "eventName", "indexName", "dataForwarding.format", "to.format" as EventName, IndexName, CreatedFormatType, updatedFormatType nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingForIndexEnabled" ,"DataForwardingForIndexUpdated" ,"DataForwardingForIndexDisabled")
| if(isNull(CreatedFormatType),if(isNull(updatedFormatType),"-",updatedFormatType),CreatedFormatType) as CurrentFormatType
| withtime CurrentFormatType
| most_recent(CurrentFormatType_withtime) as FormatType by IndexName
| where FormatType!="-"
| count as Count by FormatType

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding DataForwardingDestinationCreated
| json "eventName", "destination.destinationType" as EventName, DestinationType nodrop
| where EventName="DataForwardingDestinationCreated"
| count as Count by DestinationType

panels.title: Distribution Of Existing Encryption for Amazon S3 Data Forwarding

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=dataForwarding (DataForwardingDestinationCreated OR DataForwardingDestinationUpdated OR DataForwardingDestinationDeleted)
| json "eventName", "destinationIdentity.destinationId", "destination.encrypted", "to.encrypted" as EventName, destinationId, CreatedEncrypted, UpdatedEncrypted nodrop
| where EventName in ("DataForwardingDestinationCreated","DataForwardingDestinationUpdated","DataForwardingDestinationDeleted")
| if(isNull(CreatedEncrypted), if(isNull(UpdatedEncrypted), "-",UpdatedEncrypted), CreatedEncrypted) as CurrentEncrypted
| withtime CurrentEncrypted
| most_recent(CurrentEncrypted_withtime) as Encryption by destinationId
| where Encryption!="-"
| if (Encryption matches "true", "On", "Off") as Encryption
| count as Count by Encryption

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Content Management
children.description: Enterprise Audit - Content Management

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Content Management Overview
children.description: Content - Overview Dashboard provides a high-level view of system activities with data on content activities over time, top applications, top content, publicly accessed content, and exported content. You can also view data on user activity and top content on which permission are added and deleted.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Content Management Overview

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "contentIdentity.name","permissionsAdded" as EventName, ContentName, permissionsAdded nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
| parse regex field=permissionsAdded "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi nodrop
| json field=json_added_blob "permissionSourceType" as TargetPermissionSourceType
| count as Count by ContentName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentCopied
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "contentIdentity.name" as EventName, AdminMode, ContentName nodrop
| where EventName="ContentCopied"
| count as Count by ContentName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ApplicationInstalled
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName="ApplicationInstalled"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("ApplicationInstalled") in EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events (_sourceCategory=content OR _sourceCategory=userSessions) (AdminModeEnabled OR AdminModeDisabled OR UserLoginTimedOut)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "sessionIdentity.userEmail" as EventName, UserEmail, TimedOutUser nodrop
| where EventName in ("AdminModeEnabled", "AdminModeDisabled", "UserLoginTimedOut")
| if(isNull(TimedOutUser), UserEmail,TimedOutUser) as UserEmail
| withtime EventName
| most_recent(EventName_withtime) as CurrentEvent by UserEmail
| where CurrentEvent="AdminModeEnabled"
| count as Count by CurrentEvent
| fillmissing values("AdminModeEnabled") in CurrentEvent

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPubliclyAccessed
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPubliclyAccessed"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("ContentPubliclyAccessed") in EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentExported
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName="ContentExported"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("ContentExported") in EventName

linkedDashboards.relativePath: ../Enterprise Audit - Created, Deleted, Exported, Imported Content

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPubliclyAccessed
| json "eventName", "contentIdentity.name" as EventName, ContentName nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPubliclyAccessed"
| count as Count by ContentName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentImported OR ContentExported OR ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "adminMode", "eventName" as AdminMode, EventName nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentImported", "ContentExported", "ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied")
| timeslice 1d
|count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentImported", "ContentExported", "ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

panels.title: Top Content Made Visible to public

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content  ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated
| json "eventName", "contentIdentity.name", "to" as EventName, ContentName, VisibleTo nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated"
| withtime VisibleTo
| most_recent(VisibleTo_withtime) by ContentName
| where _mostrecent!="nonpublic"
| count as Count by ContentName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ApplicationInstalled
| json "eventName", "application.name" as EventName, ApplicationName nodrop
| where EventName="ApplicationInstalled"
| count as Count by ApplicationName
| sort by Count
| limit 7

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "contentIdentity.name","permissionsDeleted" as EventName, ContentName, permissionsDeleted nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
| parse regex field=permissionsDeleted "(?<json_deleted_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi nodrop

| count as Count by ContentName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentExported
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "contentIdentity.name" as EventName, AdminMode, ContentName nodrop

| count as Count by ContentName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

linkedDashboards.relativePath: ../Enterprise Audit - Created, Deleted, Exported, Imported Content

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentImported OR ContentExported OR ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "adminMode", "eventName", "operator.email" as AdminMode, EventName, User nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentImported", "ContentExported", "ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied")

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Created, Deleted, Exported, Imported Content
children.description: Content - Created, Deleted, Exported, Imported DashBoard provides detailed information on content that is created, deleted, exported, and imported. The dashboard is organized according to activities performed by users in User Mode and Content Administrator Mode. You can view more granular data using pre-populated filters for Event Type, Content Type and Admin Mode.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Created, Deleted, Exported, Imported Content

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp"as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="true" | where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp"as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="false" 
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp"as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="false"
| json "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type" as UserEmail, ContentType nodrop
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
|count as Count by UserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "contentIdentity.type","operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminMode, ContentType, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="true" | where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
| count as Count by ContentType, EventName
| transpose row ContentType column EventName as %"ContentCreated", %"ContentDeleted", %"ContentExported", %"ContentImported"
| sort by ContentCreated, ContentDeleted, ContentExported, ContentImported

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "adminMode", "contentIdentity.name", "contentIdentity.type", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AdminMode, ContentName, ContentType, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp nodrop
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, AdminMode, ContentName, ContentType, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, UserId
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="true"
| json "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type" as UserEmail, ContentType nodrop
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
|count as Count by UserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp"as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="true" | where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp"as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="false"
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "contentIdentity.type", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminMode, ContentType, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="false" 
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AdminMode matches "{{AdminMode}}"
| count as Count by ContentType, EventName
| transpose row ContentType column EventName as %"ContentCreated", %"ContentDeleted", %"ContentExported", %"ContentImported"
| sort by ContentCreated, ContentDeleted, ContentExported, ContentImported

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentCreated OR ContentDeleted OR ContentExported OR ContentImported)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp"as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentCreated", "ContentDeleted", "ContentExported", "ContentImported") AND AdminMode="true" AND EventName matches "*"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Field Extraction Rule Activities
children.description: Field Extraction Rule Activities DashBoard provides detailed information on the geographic location, active users, recent activities, trends, and one day time shift comparison for Field Extraction Rules. You can analyze more granular data using the pre-populated filters.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Field Extraction Rule Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=fieldExtractionRules (FieldExtractionRuleCreated OR FieldExtractionRuleUpdated OR FieldExtractionRuleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, User nodrop
| where EventName in ("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted") in EventName 
| compare timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

panels.title: Recent Events - Field Extraction Rule Events

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=fieldExtractionRules (FieldExtractionRuleCreated OR FieldExtractionRuleUpdated OR FieldExtractionRuleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "fieldExtractionRuleIdentity.fieldExtractionRuleId", "fieldExtractionRuleIdentity.fieldExtractionRuleName", "fieldExtractionRule.enabled", "fieldExtractionRule.fieldNames", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, User, UserId, UserIp, FieldExtractionRuleId, FieldExtractionRuleName, IsActive, createdfieldnames, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "enabled", "fieldNames" as ActiveUpdated, fieldNamesUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(IsActive), if(isNull(ActiveUpdated), "-", ActiveUpdated), IsActive) as IsActive
| if(isNull(createdfieldnames), if(isNull(fieldNamesUpdated), "-", fieldNamesUpdated), createdfieldnames) as FieldNames
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, FieldExtractionRuleId, FieldExtractionRuleName, IsActive, FieldNames, User, UserId, UserIp
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, UserId, FieldExtractionRuleId

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=fieldExtractionRules (FieldExtractionRuleCreated OR FieldExtractionRuleUpdated OR FieldExtractionRuleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.sourceIp","operator.email" as EventName, UserIp, User nodrop
| where EventName in ("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}"|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=fieldExtractionRules (FieldExtractionRuleCreated OR FieldExtractionRuleUpdated OR FieldExtractionRuleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "fieldExtractionRuleIdentity.fieldExtractionRuleId", "fieldExtractionRule.enabled", "to.enabled","operator.email" as EventName, FieldExtractionRuleId, CreatedEnabled, UpdatedEnabled, User nodrop
| where EventName in ("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
| if(isNull(CreatedEnabled),if(isNull(UpdatedEnabled),"-",UpdatedEnabled),CreatedEnabled) as CurrentEnabled
| withtime CurrentEnabled
| most_recent(CurrentEnabled_withtime) as Status by FieldExtractionRuleId
| where Status!="-"
| if(Status matches "true", "Active", "InActive") as Status
| count as Count by Status

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=fieldExtractionRules (FieldExtractionRuleCreated OR FieldExtractionRuleUpdated OR FieldExtractionRuleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, User nodrop
| where EventName in ("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=fieldExtractionRules (FieldExtractionRuleCreated OR FieldExtractionRuleUpdated OR FieldExtractionRuleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, User nodrop
| where EventName in ("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and User matches "{{User}}"
|count by User, EventName
| transpose row User column EventName as %"FieldExtractionRuleCreated", %"FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", %"FieldExtractionRuleDeleted" 
| sort by FieldExtractionRuleCreated, FieldExtractionRuleUpdated, FieldExtractionRuleDeleted
| limit 5

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=fieldExtractionRules (FieldExtractionRuleCreated OR FieldExtractionRuleUpdated OR FieldExtractionRuleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, User nodrop
| where EventName in ("FieldExtractionRuleCreated", "FieldExtractionRuleUpdated", "FieldExtractionRuleDeleted") AND EventName matches "*"

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Permission Updated, Synchronized
children.description: Content - Permission Updated, Synchronized DashBoard provides detailed information on content permissions that have been added or deleted, as well as content that has been synchronized. The dashboard is organized according to Content Synchronization and Content Permissions.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Permission Updated, Synchronized

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "contentIdentity.name", "contentIdentity.type", "operator.email", "permissionsAdded" as EventName, EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, UserEmail, permissionsAdded nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
| parse regex field=permissionsAdded "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi nodrop
| json field=json_added_blob "permissionSourceType" as TargetPermissionSourceType nodrop //
| json field=json_added_blob "permissions", "roleIdentity.roleName", "userIdentity.userEmail" as PermissionsAdded, RoleName, TargetUserEmail nodrop
| if(isNull(RoleName),if(isNull(TargetUserEmail),"Organization",TargetUserEmail),RoleName) as Target_User
|where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
|count by EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, UserEmail, TargetPermissionSourceType, Target_User, PermissionsAdded
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count

panels.title: Permission Added Over Time by Source Type

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "permissionsAdded", "contentIdentity.name", "operator.email" as EventName, permissionsAdded,  ContentName, UserEmail nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
| parse regex field=permissionsAdded "(?<json_added_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi nodrop
| json field=json_added_blob "permissionSourceType" as TargetPermissionSourceType 
| timeslice 1d
| where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
|count as Count by _timeslice, TargetPermissionSourceType
| transpose row _timeslice column TargetPermissionSourceType

panels.title: Top Users Updating Permissions on Content

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "contentIdentity.name", "operator.email" as EventName, ContentName, UserEmail  nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
|where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
|count as Count by UserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

panels.title: Permission Deleted Over Time by Source Type

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "permissionsDeleted", "contentIdentity.name", "operator.email"  as EventName, permissionsDeleted,  ContentName, UserEmail nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
| parse regex field=permissionsDeleted "(?<json_deleted_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi nodrop
| json field=json_deleted_blob "permissionSourceType" as TargetPermissionSourceType nodrop //
| timeslice 1d
|where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
|count as Count by _timeslice, TargetPermissionSourceType
| transpose row _timeslice column TargetPermissionSourceType

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentSynchronizationRequested
| json "eventName", "syncRequest.contentNameToSynchronize","contentIdentity.name", "syncRequest.requestBy.userEmail" as EventName, ContentToSynchronize, ContentName, UserEmail
| where EventName="ContentSynchronizationRequested"
|where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
| count as Count by ContentToSynchronize
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentSynchronizationCompleted
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "status", "syncRequest.requestBy.userEmail", "syncRequest.contentNameToSynchronize", "syncRequest.parentFolder.name", "contentIdentity.name" as EventName, EventTime, Status, RequestedBy, ContentToSynchronize, FolderName, ContentName  nodrop
| RequestedBy as UserEmail
| where EventName="ContentSynchronizationCompleted"
| where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
|count by  EventTime, Status, RequestedBy, ContentToSynchronize, FolderName
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count

panels.title: Top Users to Request for Synchronization

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentSynchronizationRequested
| json "eventName", "syncRequest.requestBy.userEmail", "contentIdentity.name" as EventName, UserEmail, ContentName  nodrop
| where EventName="ContentSynchronizationRequested"
| where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"|count as Count by UserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "contentIdentity.name", "operator.email" as EventName, ContentName, UserEmail  nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
|where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
|count as Count by ContentName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentSynchronizationCompleted
| json "eventName", "status","syncRequest.requestBy.userEmail", "contentIdentity.name" as EventName, Status,  UserEmail, ContentName  nodrop
| where EventName="ContentSynchronizationCompleted"
| where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
| timeslice 12h
| count as Count by _timeslice, Status
| transpose row _timeslice column Status

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPermissionsUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "contentIdentity.name", "contentIdentity.type", "operator.email", "permissionsDeleted" as EventName, EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, UserEmail, permissionsDeleted nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPermissionsUpdated"
| parse regex field=permissionsDeleted "(?<json_deleted_blob>\{[^\}]+(?:\}\}|\}))" multi nodrop
| json field=json_deleted_blob "permissionSourceType" as TargetPermissionSourceType nodrop //
| json field=json_deleted_blob "permissions", "roleIdentity.roleName", "userIdentity.userEmail" as PermissionsDeleted, RoleName, TargetUserEmail nodrop
| if(isNull(RoleName),if(isNull(TargetUserEmail),"Organization",TargetUserEmail),RoleName) as Target_User
|where  ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}" and EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}"
|count by EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, UserEmail, TargetPermissionSourceType, Target_User, PermissionsDeleted
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count
