children.name: Enterprise Audit - Publicly Accessed, Application Installed
children.description: Content - Publicly Accessed, Application DashBoard provides detailed information on installed applications, shared and publicly accessed content. The dashboard is organized according to installed applications and publicly accessed content. For a more granular view of the data, you can filter on Event Type, Content Type, Admin Mode, Visibility using the pre-populated filters.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Publicly Accessed, Application Installed

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated OR ContentPubliclyAccessed OR ApplicationInstalled)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type"  as EventName, UserEmail, ContentName  nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated","ContentPubliclyAccessed","ApplicationInstalled") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated","ContentPubliclyAccessed","ApplicationInstalled") in EventName
| compare with timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated
| json "eventName","eventTime", "contentIdentity.name", "contentIdentity.type", "adminMode", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp", "url", "to" as EventName,EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, AdminMode, UserEmail, UserIp, URL, VisibleTo nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated" 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"
|count by EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, AdminMode,VisibleTo, UserEmail, UserIp, URL
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ApplicationInstalled
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "application.name", "dataSources","operator.email", "contentIdentity.type" as EventName, EventTime, ApplicationName, DataSources, UserEmail, ContentName nodrop
| where EventName="ApplicationInstalled"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"
| parse regex field=DataSources "\"(?<LogSourceType>.*?)\":\"(?<LogSource>.*?)\"" multi nodrop
| replace(LogSource, "\\", "") as LogSource
| count as Count by EventTime, ApplicationName, LogSourceType, LogSource
| sort by EventTime
| fields - Count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated OR ContentPubliclyAccessed OR ApplicationInstalled)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type"  as EventName, UserEmail, ContentName  nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated","ContentPubliclyAccessed","ApplicationInstalled") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"
| timeslice 12h
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(12h), values("ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated","ContentPubliclyAccessed","ApplicationInstalled") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPubliclyAccessed
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "contentIdentity.name", "contentIdentity.type", "visibility", "viewerIp", "url", "adminMode", "operator.email" as EventName, EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, Visibility, ViewerIp, URL, AdminMode, UserEmail nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPubliclyAccessed" 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"
|count by EventTime, ContentName, ContentType, Visibility, ViewerIp, URL, AdminMode
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type", "to",  "contentIdentity.name" as EventName, AdminMode, UserEmail, ContentType, VisibleTo, ContentName nodrop
| where EventName="ContentPublicVisibilityUpdated" 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"|count as Count by UserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and ApplicationInstalled
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type"  as EventName, UserEmail, ContentName  nodrop
| where EventName="ApplicationInstalled" 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"
| _sourceHost as UserIp
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content ContentPubliclyAccessed
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type","viewerIp" as EventName, UserEmail, ContentName, UserIp  nodrop
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserEmail matches "{{UserEmail}}" and ContentName matches "{{ContentName}}"
| where EventName="ContentPubliclyAccessed"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=collection (SourceCreated OR SourceUpdated OR SourceDeleted)
| json "eventName", "sourceIdentity.sourceId", "source.sourceType", "to.sourceType" as EventName, SourceId, Source, SourceTypeUpdated nodrop
| count by EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content 
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type", "to" as EventName, AdminMode, UserEmail, ContentType, VisibleTo nodrop
| count by UserEmail

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content 
| json  "contentIdentity.name" as ContentName
| count by ContentName

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Updated, Moved, Copied Content
children.description: Content - Updated, Moved, Copied DashBoard provides detailed information about content that is updated, moved and copied. The dashboard is organized according to activities performed  by users in User Mode and Content Administrator Mode. You can view more granular data using pre-populated filters for Event Type, Content Type and Admin Mode.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Updated, Moved, Copied Content

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "adminMode", "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type", "operator.sourceIp" as AdminMode, EventName, UserEmail, ContentType, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="false" 
| where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| count as Count by ContentType, EventName
| transpose row ContentType column EventName as %"ContentUpdated", %"ContentMoved", %"ContentCopied"
| sort by ContentUpdated, ContentMoved, ContentCopied

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="false"
| where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="true" 
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
|where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="false" 
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
|where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "adminMode", "eventName",  "operator.sourceIp" as AdminMode, EventName, UserIp  nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="true" 
|where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "adminMode", "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type",  "operator.sourceIp" as AdminMode, EventName, UserEmail, ContentType, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="true" 
|where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| count as Count by ContentType, EventName
| transpose row ContentType column EventName as %"ContentUpdated", %"ContentMoved", %"ContentCopied"
| sort by ContentUpdated, ContentMoved, ContentCopied

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "adminMode", "contentIdentity.name", "contentIdentity.type", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AdminMode, ContentName, ContentType, UserEmail, UserId, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied")
| json "copiedTo.contentIdentity.name" as TargetContentName nodrop
| json "origin.name", "destination.name" as SourceFolder, TargetFolder nodrop
| if(isNull(TargetContentName), "-", TargetContentName) as CopiedContentName
| if(isNull(SourceFolder), "-", SourceFolder) as OriginFolderName
| if(isNull(TargetFolder), "-", TargetFolder) as DestinationFolderName
| where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, AdminMode, ContentName, ContentType,UserEmail, UserId, UserIp, CopiedContentName, OriginFolderName, DestinationFolderName
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, UserId
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "adminMode", "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type","operator.sourceIp"  as AdminMode, EventName, UserEmail, ContentType, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="false" 
|where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
|count as Count by UserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "adminMode", "eventName", "operator.email", "contentIdentity.type","operator.sourceIp" as AdminMode, EventName, UserEmail, ContentType, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="true" 
| where  UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"|count as Count by UserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=content and (ContentUpdated OR ContentMoved OR ContentCopied)
| json "eventName", "adminMode", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminMode, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("ContentUpdated", "ContentMoved", "ContentCopied") AND AdminMode="false" AND EventName matches "*"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Access Key Activities
children.description: Access Key Activities DashBoard provides detailed information about access key activities, such as creation, deletion, and updates. You can also review trends, user activity, the number of active access keys, and one-day time comparisons.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Access Key Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from", "to.enabled"  as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, IsActiveUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(IsActive), if(isNull(IsActiveUpdated), "-", IsActiveUpdated) ,IsActive) as IsActive
| json field=CurrentValue "accessKeyLabel", "enabled" as AccessKeyLabelUpdated, EnabledUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(AccessKeyLabel), if(isNull(AccessKeyLabelUpdated), "-", AccessKeyLabelUpdated) ,AccessKeyLabel) as AccessKeyLabel
| if(isNull(IsActive), if(isNull(EnabledUpdated), "-", EnabledUpdated) ,IsActive) as IsActive
| where EventName in 
("AccessKeyCreated","AccessKeyDeleted","AccessKeyUpdated") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and AccessId matches "{{AccessId}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AccessKeyLabel matches "{{AccessKeyLabel}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, AccessId, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, User, UserId, UserIp, CurrentValue, PreviousValue
| sort by EventTime desc
| fields - _count, UserId, CurrentValue, PreviousValue
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from", "to.enabled"  as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, IsActiveUpdated nodrop
| where EventName in ("AccessKeyCreated","AccessKeyDeleted","AccessKeyUpdated") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and AccessId matches "{{AccessId}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AccessKeyLabel matches "{{AccessKeyLabel}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("AccessKeyCreated", "AccessKeyUpdated", "AccessKeyDeleted") in EventName 
| compare timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from", "to.enabled"  as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, IsActiveUpdated nodrop
| where EventName in ("AccessKeyCreated","AccessKeyDeleted","AccessKeyUpdated")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and AccessId matches "{{AccessId}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AccessKeyLabel matches "{{AccessKeyLabel}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from", "to.enabled"  as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, IsActiveUpdated nodrop
| if(isNull(IsActive), if(isNull(IsActiveUpdated), "-", IsActiveUpdated) ,IsActive) as IsActive
| where EventName in ("AccessKeyCreated","AccessKeyDeleted","AccessKeyUpdated") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and AccessId matches "{{AccessId}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AccessKeyLabel matches "{{AccessKeyLabel}}"
| withtime IsActive
| most_recent(IsActive_withtime) as Status by AccessId
| count as Count by Status
| where Status != "-"
| if (Status matches "true", "Active", "InActive") as Status

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from", "to.enabled"  as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, IsActiveUpdated nodrop
| where EventName in ("AccessKeyCreated","AccessKeyDeleted","AccessKeyUpdated") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and AccessId matches "{{AccessId}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AccessKeyLabel matches "{{AccessKeyLabel}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("AccessKeyCreated", "AccessKeyUpdated", "AccessKeyDeleted") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from", "to.enabled"  as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue, IsActiveUpdated nodrop
| where EventName in 
("AccessKeyCreated","AccessKeyDeleted","AccessKeyUpdated") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and AccessId matches "{{AccessId}}" and User matches "{{User}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" and AccessKeyLabel matches "{{AccessKeyLabel}}"
|count by User, EventName
| transpose row User column EventName as %"AccessKeyCreated", %"AccessKeyUpdated", %"AccessKeyDeleted"
| sort by AccessKeyCreated, AccessKeyUpdated, AccessKeyDeleted
| limit 5

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by User

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by AccessId

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| count by AccessKeyLabel

_index=sumologic_audit_events _SourceCategory=accessKeys (AccessKeyCreated OR AccessKeyDeleted OR AccessKeyUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accessId", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "accessKey.accessKeyLabel", "accessKey.enabled", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, AccessId, User, UserId, UserIp, AccessKeyLabel, IsActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Australia embargoed countries

search.queryText:
_index=sumologic_audit_events (_sourceCategory=userSessions or _sourceCategory=collection) (UserLoggedIn OR CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeRequested OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)
| json "eventName"  as EventName
| where EventName in ("UserLoggedIn", "CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "EphemeralCollectorDeleted", "ClobberCollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeRequested", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted")
| json "userSession.sourceIp" as srcIP  nodrop 
| json "operator.sourceIp" as  srcIp_1 nodrop
| if (isNull(srcIp), srcIp_1, srcIp) as srcIp
| lookup country_name from geo://location on ip=srcIp 
| where country_name in ("Iran", "North Korea", "Myanmar","Mali")

children.description: User and Collector activities from Countries under targeted sanctions programs by United States

children.name: Enterprise Audit - Password Policy, MFA, Service AllowList Activities
children.description: Password Policy, MFA, Service AllowList Activities Dashboard provides detailed information about password policy creation, deletion, and updates. It also provides a high-level view of users that enable and disable multi factor authorization (MFA), service allowlist updates, as well as user and admin activities.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - Password Policy, MFA, Service AllowList Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=serviceAllowlist ServiceAllowlistUpdated
| json "eventName", "addedCIDRs[*].cidr","operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AllowListUsers,AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="ServiceAllowlistUpdated"
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| extract field=AllowListUsers "\"(?<IP>.*?)\"" multi
| count_distinct(IP) as Count by IP
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = IP
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events (_sourceCategory=serviceAllowlist OR _sourceCategory=passwordPolicy OR _sourceCategory=multiFactorAuthentication)
| json "operator.sourceIp" as AdminIp nodrop
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = AdminIp
|where if ("{{AdminIp}}" = "*", true, AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}")
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events  _sourceCategory=passwordPolicy PasswordPolicyUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "from", "to", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, PreviousValue, CurrentValue, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="PasswordPolicyUpdated"
| json field=PreviousValue "expireAfterDays", "reuseAfterChanges", "lockoutPolicy.failedAttempts", "lockoutPolicy.lockoutMinutes", "mfaPolicy.required", "mfaPolicy.rememberBrowser" as PreviousexpireAfterDays, PreviousreuseAfterChanges, PreviousfailedAttempts, PreviouslockoutMinutes, Previousrequired, PreviousrememberBrowser nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "expireAfterDays", "reuseAfterChanges", "lockoutPolicy.failedAttempts", "lockoutPolicy.lockoutMinutes", "mfaPolicy.required", "mfaPolicy.rememberBrowser" as CurrentexpireAfterDays, CurrentreuseAfterChanges, CurrentfailedAttempts, CurrentlockoutMinutes, Currentrequired, CurrentrememberBrowser nodrop
| if(PreviousexpireAfterDays!=CurrentexpireAfterDays, concat("PasswordExpiryAfterDays changed from ", PreviousexpireAfterDays, " to ", CurrentexpireAfterDays), "NoChange") as PasswordExpiryAfterDays
| if(PreviousreuseAfterChanges!=CurrentreuseAfterChanges, concat("PasswordReuseAfterChanges changed from ", PreviousreuseAfterChanges, " to ", CurrentreuseAfterChanges), "NoChange") as PasswordReuseAfterChanges
| if(PreviousfailedAttempts!=CurrentfailedAttempts, concat("LockOutAfterFailedAttempts changed from ", PreviousfailedAttempts, " to ", CurrentfailedAttempts), "NoChange") as LockOutAfterFailedAttempts
| if(PreviouslockoutMinutes!=CurrentlockoutMinutes, concat("LockOutMinutes changed from ", PreviouslockoutMinutes, " to ", CurrentlockoutMinutes), "NoChange") as LockOutMinutes
| if(Previousrequired!=Currentrequired, concat("MFARequired changed from ", Previousrequired, " to ", Currentrequired), "NoChange") as MFARequired
| if(PreviousrememberBrowser!=CurrentrememberBrowser, concat("RememberBrowser changed from ", PreviousrememberBrowser, " to ", CurrentrememberBrowser), "NoChange") as RememberBrowser
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by EventTime, Admin, AdminIp, PasswordExpiryAfterDays, PasswordReuseAfterChanges, LockOutAfterFailedAttempts, LockOutMinutes, MFARequired, RememberBrowser
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory="saml" (SamlConfigurationCreated OR SamlConfigurationUpdated OR SamlConfigurationDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "samlConfigurationIdentity.id", "samlConfigurationIdentity.configurationName", "samlConfiguration", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, ConfigurationId, ConfigurationName, ConfigurationDetails, CurrentValue, PreviuosValue nodrop
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}"  
| where EventName in ("SamlConfigurationCreated", "SamlConfigurationUpdated", "SamlConfigurationDeleted") 
|count by EventName, EventTime, ConfigurationName, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, ConfigurationId, ConfigurationDetails, CurrentValue, PreviuosValue
| fields - _count, AdminId, ConfigurationId, ConfigurationDetails, CurrentValue, PreviuosValue

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=saml
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName in ("SamlConfigurationCreated", "SamlConfigurationUpdated", "SamlConfigurationDeleted", "SamlLockdownEnabled", "SamlLockdownDisabled", "AllowlistedUsersCreated", "AllowlistedUsersDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("SamlConfigurationCreated", "SamlConfigurationUpdated", "SamlConfigurationDeleted" , "SamlLockdownEnabled", "SamlLockdownDisabled", "AllowlistedUsersCreated", "AllowlistedUsersDeleted") in EventName 
| compare timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=saml (AllowlistedUsersCreated OR AllowlistedUsersDeleted)
| json "eventName" as EventName nodrop
| where EventName in ("AllowlistedUsersCreated", "AllowlistedUsersDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d),
  values("AllowlistedUsersCreated", "AllowlistedUsersDeleted") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=saml (AllowlistedUsersCreated OR AllowlistedUsersDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "allowlistedUsers"  as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, allowlistedUsers nodrop
| parse regex field=allowlistedUsers "\"userEmail\":\"(?<UserAddedToAllowList>.*?)\"" multi
| where EventName in ("AllowlistedUsersCreated", "AllowlistedUsersDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
|count by EventTime, EventName, UserAddedToAllowList, Admin, AdminIp
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=saml
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp
| where EventName in ("SamlConfigurationCreated", "SamlConfigurationUpdated", "SamlConfigurationDeleted", "SamlLockdownEnabled", "SamlLockdownDisabled", "AllowlistedUsersCreated", "AllowlistedUsersDeleted")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
|count by EventName, Admin
| transpose row Admin column EventName as %"SamlConfigurationCreated", %"SamlConfigurationUpdated", %"SamlConfigurationDeleted", %"SamlLockdownEnabled", %"SamlLockdownDisabled", %"AllowlistedUsersCreated", %"AllowlistedUsersDeleted"
| sort by SamlConfigurationCreated, SamlConfigurationUpdated, SamlConfigurationDeleted, SamlLockdownEnabled, SamlLockdownDisabled, AllowlistedUsersCreated, AllowlistedUsersDeleted
| limit 5

  values("SamlConfigurationCreated", "SamlConfigurationUpdated", "SamlConfigurationDeleted") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=saml (SamlLockdownEnabled OR SamlLockdownDisabled)

_index=sumologic_audit_events (_sourceCategory=userSessions or _sourceCategory=collection) (UserLoggedIn OR CollectorCreated OR CollectorUpdated OR CollectorDeleted OR EphemeralCollectorDeleted OR ClobberCollectorDeleted OR CollectorUpgradeRequested OR CollectorUpgradeCompleted)

| where EventName in ("UserLoggedIn", "CollectorCreated", "CollectorUpdated", "CollectorDeleted", "EphemeralCollectorDeleted", "ClobberCollectorDeleted", "CollectorUpgradeRequested", "CollectorUpgradeCompleted")

| if (isNull(srcIp), srcIp_1, srcIp) as srcIp

| where country_name in ("Iran", "North Korea", "Syria","Sudan","Cuba","Venezuela")

| json "eventName", "to.capabilities", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, capabilities_updated, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("RoleCreated","RoleUpdated","RoleDeleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"

| where EventName="RoleUpdated"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| parse regex field=capabilities_updated "\"(?<Capability>.*?)\"" multi nodrop
| count as Count by Capability
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles (RoleCreated OR RoleUpdated OR RoleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "to.capabilities", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, capabilities_updated, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("RoleCreated","RoleUpdated","RoleDeleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("RoleCreated","RoleUpdated","RoleDeleted") in EventName
| compare with timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles (RoleCreated OR RoleUpdated OR RoleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "to.capabilities", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, capabilities_updated, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("RoleCreated","RoleUpdated","RoleDeleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| timeslice 1d
|count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("RoleCreated","RoleUpdated","RoleDeleted") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles (RoleCreated OR RoleUpdated OR RoleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "to.capabilities", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, capabilities_updated, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| if(isEmpty(Admin) , "SystemGenerated", Admin) as Admin
| where EventName in ("RoleCreated","RoleUpdated","RoleDeleted") AND EventName matches "{{EventName}}"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"|count by Admin, EventName
| transpose row Admin column EventName as %"RoleCreated", %"RoleUpdated", %"RoleDeleted"
| sort by RoleCreated, RoleUpdated, RoleDeleted
| limit 5

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles (RoleCreated OR RoleUpdated OR RoleDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "roleIdentity.roleId", "roleIdentity.roleName", "role.systemDefined", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, RoleId, RoleName, SystemDefined, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "systemDefined", "capabilities[*]" as SystemDefinedUpdated, Capabilities nodrop
| parse field=Capabilities "[*]" as Capabilities nodrop
| replace(Capabilities, "\"", "") as Capabilities
| if(isNull(SystemDefined), if(isNull(SystemDefinedUpdated), "-", SystemDefinedUpdated) , SystemDefined) as SystemDefined
| if(isNull(Capabilities), "-" , Capabilities) as Capabilities
| where EventName in ("RoleCreated","RoleUpdated","RoleDeleted") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, RoleId, RoleName, SystemDefined, Capabilities
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, AdminId, RoleId

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles RoleCreated
| json "eventName", "role.systemDefined","operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, SystemDefined, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventNAme="RoleCreated" 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| count as Count by SystemDefined
| if(SystemDefined="true", "System Defined", "User Defined") as SystemDefined

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events
| where _sourceCategory in ("users", "roles", "userSessions")
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, User nodrop
| json "userSession.email" as LoginUser nodrop
| json "sessionIdentity.userEmail" as LogoutUser nodrop
| json "userIdentity.userEmail" as LockedUser nodrop
| if(isEmpty(LoginUser), if(isEmpty(LogoutUser), if(isEmpty(LockedUser), "", LockedUser),LogoutUser), LoginUser) as UserEmail
| if(isEmpty(UserEmail), User, UserEmail) as User
| count as Count by User
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events
| where _sourceCategory in ("users", "roles", "userSessions")
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, User nodrop
| json "userSession.email" as LoginUser nodrop
| json "sessionIdentity.userEmail" as LogoutUser nodrop
| json "userIdentity.userEmail" as LockedUser nodrop
| if(isEmpty(LoginUser), if(isEmpty(LogoutUser), if(isEmpty(LockedUser), "", LockedUser),LogoutUser), LoginUser) as UserEmail
| if(isEmpty(UserEmail), User, UserEmail) as User
| count as Count by User, _sourceCategory
| transpose row User column _sourceCategory as %"userSessions", %"users", %"roles"
| sort by userSessions, users, roles
| limit 5

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserCreated OR UserUpdated OR UserDeleted)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "userIdentity.userId", "userIdentity.userEmail", "user.firstName", "user.lastName", "user.active", "to", "from" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, UserId, TargetUserEmail, TargetUserFirstName, TargetUserLastName, IsTargetUserActive, CurrentValue, PreviousValue nodrop
| json field=CurrentValue "firstName", "lastName", "active" as UpdatedFirstName, UpdatedLastName, UpdatedIsActive nodrop
| if(isNull(TargetUserFirstName), if(isNull(UpdatedFirstName),"-",UpdatedFirstName) ,TargetUserFirstName) as TargetUserFirstName
| if(isNull(TargetUserLastName), if(isNull(UpdatedLastName),"-",UpdatedLastName) ,TargetUserLastName) as TargetUserLastName
| if(isNull(IsTargetUserActive), if(isNull(UpdatedIsActive),"-",UpdatedIsActive) ,IsTargetUserActive) as IsTargetUserActive
| where EventName in ("UserCreated","UserUpdated", "UserDeleted") 
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, UserId, TargetUserEmail, TargetUserFirstName, TargetUserLastName, IsTargetUserActive
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, AdminId, UserId

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserCreated OR UserUpdated OR UserDeleted)
| json "eventName", "userIdentity.userId", "user.active", "to.active", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, UserId, ActiveCreated, ActiveUpdated,  Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserCreated","UserUpdated", "UserDeleted")
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| if(isNull(ActiveCreated), if(isNull(ActiveUpdated), "-", ActiveUpdated) ,ActiveCreated) as CurrentActive
| withtime CurrentActive
| most_recent(CurrentActive_withtime) as Status by UserId
| where Status!="-"
| count as Count by Status
| if(Status matches "true", "Active", "InActive") as Status

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserCreated OR UserUpdated OR UserDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserCreated","UserUpdated", "UserDeleted")
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("UserCreated","UserUpdated","UserDeleted") in EventName
| compare with timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserCreated OR UserUpdated OR UserDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop

| where EventName in ("UserCreated","UserUpdated", "UserDeleted")
| where  EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"|count by Admin, EventName
| transpose row Admin column EventName as %"UserCreated", %"UserUpdated", %"UserDeleted"
| sort by UserCreated, UserUpdated, UserDeleted

| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = AdminIp
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserCreated OR UserUpdated OR UserDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop

| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

| json "eventName", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, AdminIp nodrop
| count by EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserCreated OR UserUpdated OR UserDeleted)
| json "eventName", "operator.email" as EventName, Admin nodrop
| count by Admin

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserCreated OR UserUpdated OR UserDeleted)

children.name: Enterprise Audit - User Role Relationship Activities
children.description: User Role Relationship Activities DashBoard provides detailed information on activities for user and role modification. You can review the top users that were added to and removed from roles, the top roles from which users were added and removed, and the top admins.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - User Role Relationship Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events (_sourceCategory=users OR _sourceCategory=roles) (RolesAssignedToUserUpdated OR UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email","operator.id","operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("RolesAssignedToUserUpdated","UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated")
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count as Count by Admin 
| sort by Count
| limit 5

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users RolesAssignedToUserUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "rolesDeleted[*]", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, RolesRemoved, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="RolesAssignedToUserUpdated"
| parse regex field=RolesRemoved "\"roleName\":\"(?<RoleName>.*?)\"" multi
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count as Count by RoleName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "usersDeleted[*]","operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, UsersRemoved, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated"
| parse regex field=UsersRemoved "\"userEmail\":\"(?<TargetUserEmail>.*?)\"" multi
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"|count as Count by TargetUserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users RolesAssignedToUserUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "rolesAdded[*]","operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, RolesAdded, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="RolesAssignedToUserUpdated"
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| parse regex field=RolesAdded "\"roleName\":\"(?<RoleName>.*?)\"" multi
|count as Count by RoleName
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users RolesAssignedToUserUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email","operator.id","operator.sourceIp", "userIdentity.userId","userIdentity.userEmail", "rolesAdded[*].roleName", "rolesDeleted[*].roleName" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail, RolesAdded, RolesRemoved nodrop
| where EventName="RolesAssignedToUserUpdated"
| parse field=RolesAdded "[*]" as RolesAdded nodrop
| replace(RolesAdded, "\"", "") as RolesAdded
| replace(RolesAdded, "[]", "-") as RolesAdded
| parse field=RolesRemoved "[*]" as RolesRemoved nodrop
| replace(RolesRemoved, "\"", "") as RolesRemoved
| replace(RolesRemoved, "[]", "-") as RolesRemoved
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail, RolesAdded, RolesRemoved
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, EventTime, EventName, AdminId, TargetUserId

_index=sumologic_audit_events (_sourceCategory=users OR _sourceCategory=roles) (RolesAssignedToUserUpdated OR UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("RolesAssignedToUserUpdated","UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = AdminIp
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "usersAdded[*]", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, UsersAdded, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated"
| parse regex field=UsersAdded "\"userEmail\":\"(?<TargetUserEmail>.*?)\"" multi
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"|count as Count by TargetUserEmail
| sort by Count
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=roles UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email","operator.id","operator.sourceIp", "roleIdentity.roleId","roleIdentity.roleName", "usersAdded[*].userEmail", "usersDeleted[*].userEmail" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, RoleId, RoleName, UsersAdded, UsersRemoved nodrop
| where EventName="UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated"
| parse field=UsersAdded "[*]" as UsersAdded nodrop
| replace(UsersAdded, "\"", "") as UsersAdded
| replace(UsersAdded, "[]", "-") as UsersAdded
| parse field=UsersRemoved "[*]" as UsersRemoved nodrop
| replace(UsersRemoved, "\"", "") as UsersRemoved
| replace(UsersRemoved, "[]", "-") as UsersRemoved
| where AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, RoleId, RoleName, UsersAdded, UsersRemoved
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, EventTime, EventName, AdminId, RoleId

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events (_sourceCategory=users OR _sourceCategory=roles) (RolesAssignedToUserUpdated OR UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("RolesAssignedToUserUpdated","UsersAssignedToRoleUpdated")
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = AdminIp

children.name: Enterprise Audit - User Session Activities
children.description: User Session Activities DashBoard provides detailed information on user session activities, such as locked and unlocked account activities, top admins, current logged in and logged out users, and timed out users.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - User Session Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions UserUnlocked
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accountId", "userIdentity", "operator", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AccountId, userIdentity, operator, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserUnlocked"
| json field=userIdentity "userEmail", "userId" as User, UserId nodrop
| json field=operator "email", "sourceIp", "interface" as UnlockedBy, UnlockedByIp , Interface nodrop
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
|count by EventName, EventTime, AccountId, User, UserId, UnlockedBy, UnlockedByIp, Interface
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, EventName, AccountId, UserId

_index=sumologic_audit_events  _sourceCategory=userSessions (UserLoggedOut OR UserLoggedIn OR UserLockedOut OR UserUnlocked OR UserLoginTimedOut)
| json "eventName", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserLoggedOut", "UserLoggedIn", "UserLockedOut", "UserUnlocked", "UserLoginTimedOut") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("UserLoggedOut", "UserLoggedIn", "UserLockedOut", "UserUnlocked", "UserLoginTimedOut") in EventName 
| compare timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions UserLoggedIn
| json "eventName", "authenticationSource", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, AuthenticationSource, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserLoggedIn"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
|count as Count by AuthenticationSource

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions (UserLoggedOut OR UserLoggedIn OR UserLockedOut OR UserUnlocked OR UserLoginTimedOut)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accountId", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AccountId, UserIp nodrop
| json "userSession.email", "userSession.id" as LoginUser, LoginUserId nodrop
| json "sessionIdentity.userEmail", "sessionIdentity.userId" as LogoutUser, LogoutUserId nodrop
| json "userIdentity.userEmail", "userIdentity.userId" as LockedUser, LockedUserId nodrop
| json "authenticationSource" as AuthenticationSource nodrop
| if(isEmpty(LoginUser), if(isEmpty(LogoutUser), if(isEmpty(LockedUser), "", LockedUser),LogoutUser), LoginUser) as User
| if(isEmpty(LoginUserId), if(isEmpty(LogoutUserId), if(isEmpty(LockedUserId), "", LockedUserId),LogoutUserId), LoginUserId) as UserId
| _sourceHost as UserIp
| where EventName in ("UserLoggedOut", "UserLoggedIn", "UserLockedOut", "UserUnlocked", "UserLoginTimedOut") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
|count by EventName, EventTime, User, UserId, UserIp, AuthenticationSource
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, UserId
| limit 100

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions (UserLoggedOut OR UserLoggedIn OR UserLoginTimedOut)
| json "eventName", "userSession.id", "sessionIdentity.userId", "userSession.sourceIp"  as EventName, LoginUserId, LogoutUserID, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserLoggedOut","UserLoggedIn","UserLoginTimedOut")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
| if(isNull(LoginUserId), LogoutUserID, LoginUserId) as UserId
| withtime EventName
| most_recent(EventName_withtime) as LastEvent by UserId
| where UserId!="-"
| where LastEvent matches "UserLoggedIn"
| count as Count by LastEvent
| fillmissing values("UserLoggedIn") in LastEvent

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions UserLoggedOut
| json "eventName", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserLoggedOut"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("UserLoggedOut") in EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions UserLoggedIn
| json "eventName", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName,UserIp  nodrop 
| where EventName="UserLoggedIn" 
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = UserIp
|where EventName matches "*"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions UserLoginTimedOut
| json "eventName", "userSession.sourceIp"  as EventName, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserLoginTimedOut"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("UserLoginTimedOut") in EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions (UserLockedOut OR UserUnlocked)
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accountId", "userIdentity", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AccountId, userIdentity, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
| where EventName in ("UserLockedOut","UserUnlocked")
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeSlice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("UserLockedOut", "UserUnlocked") in EventName
| sort by _timeSlice
| transpose row _timeSlice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions (UserLockedOut OR UserUnlocked)
| json "eventName", "userIdentity.userEmail", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, UserId, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserLockedOut", "UserUnlocked")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
| withtime EventName
| most_recent(EventName_withtime) as LastEvent by UserId
| where LastEvent matches "UserLockedOut"
| count as Count by LastEvent
| fillmissing values("UserLockedOut") in LastEvent

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions UserUnlocked
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accountId", "operator", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AccountId, operator, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserUnlocked"
| json field=operator "email", "interface" as UnlockedBy , Interface nodrop
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
|count as Unlock_Count by UnlockedBy
| sort by Unlock_Count
| limit 5

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions UserLockedOut
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accountId", "userIdentity", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, AccountId, userIdentity, UserIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserLockedOut"
| json field=userIdentity "userEmail", "userId" as User, UserId nodrop
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and UserIp matches "{{UserIp}}" 
|count by EventName, EventTime, AccountId, User, UserId
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, EventName, AccountId, UserId

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions 
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "accountId", "userIdentity" as EventName, EventTime, AccountId, userIdentity nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "userEmail", "userId" as User, UserId nodrop
| count by EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=userSessions 
| json "eventName", "userSession.sourceIp" as EventName,UserIp  nodrop 
| count by UserIp

children.name: Enterprise Audit - User(Email, Password) Activities
children.description: User (Email, Password) Activities DashBoard provides detailed information on user password and email activities, such as password changes, password resets by admins, and user email change requests and changes.
children.title: Enterprise Audit - User(Email, Password) Activities

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users UserPasswordReset
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "userIdentity.userId", "userIdentity.userEmail" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail nodrop
| where EventName="UserPasswordReset"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, EventName, AdminId, TargetUserId

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users UserEmailChanged
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "userIdentity.userId", "newEmail", "oldEmail","operator.email", "operator.sourceIp" as EventName, EventTime, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail, TargetUserOldEmail, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserEmailChanged"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count by EventName, EventTime, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail, TargetUserOldEmail
| sort by EventTime
| fields - _count, EventName, TargetUserId

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserPasswordReset OR UserPasswordChanged OR UserEmailChangeRequested OR UserEmailChanged)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserPasswordReset", "UserPasswordChanged", "UserEmailChangeRequested", "UserEmailChanged")
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| count as Count by EventName
| fillmissing values("UserPasswordReset","UserPasswordChanged","UserEmailChangeRequested","UserEmailChanged") in EventName
| compare with timeshift 1d as Shift_1d

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserEmailChangeRequested OR UserEmailChanged)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserEmailChangeRequested", "UserEmailChanged") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("UserEmailChangeRequested", "UserEmailChanged") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserPasswordReset OR UserPasswordChanged)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserPasswordReset", "UserPasswordChanged") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| timeslice 1d
| count as Count by _timeslice, EventName
| fillmissing timeslice(1d), values("UserPasswordReset", "UserPasswordChanged") in EventName
| transpose row _timeslice column EventName

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users UserPasswordReset
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName="UserPasswordReset"
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
|count as Count by EventName, Admin
| sort by Count
| fields - EventName
| limit 10

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users (UserEmailChangeRequested OR UserEmailChanged OR UserPasswordReset OR UserPasswordChanged)
| json "eventName", "operator.email", "operator.sourceIp"  as EventName, Admin, AdminIp nodrop
| where EventName in ("UserEmailChangeRequested", "UserEmailChanged", "UserPasswordReset", "UserPasswordChanged") 
| where EventName matches "{{EventName}}" and Admin matches "{{Admin}}" and AdminIp matches "{{AdminIp}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = AdminIp
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users 
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "userIdentity.userId", "userIdentity.userEmail" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail nodrop
| count by TargetUserEmail

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users 
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "userIdentity.userId", "userIdentity.userEmail" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail nodrop
| count by Admin

_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourceCategory=users 
| json "eventName", "eventTime", "operator.email", "operator.id", "operator.sourceIp", "userIdentity.userId", "userIdentity.userEmail" as EventName, EventTime, Admin, AdminId, AdminIp, TargetUserId, TargetUserEmail nodrop
| count by AdminIp

children.name: Enterprise Search Audit
children.description: Enterprise Search Audit

children.name: Enterprise Search Audit - Commonly Referenced Data Sources
children.description: The Enterprise Search Audit - Commonly Referenced Data Sources dashboard provides insights into the key or most popular data sources and metadata referenced in users’ searches. The dashboard helps you understand what your users most commonly search for in your organization.
children.title: Enterprise Search Audit - Commonly Referenced Data Sources

panels.title: Popular Partitions and Views Referenced by Queries

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:_index|_view)\s*=\s*(?<meta_index>[^\s\|\)]+)" multi nodrop 
| where meta_index!=""
|where query_type matches "{{query_type}}" AND user_name matches "{{user_name}}"
|count by meta_index | sort by _count

panels.title: Top 10 Partitions and Views Referenced by Queries per Tier

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:_index|_view)\s*=\s*(?<meta_index>[^\s\|\)]+)" multi nodrop 
| where meta_index!=""
| count by meta_index,analytics_tier 
| topk(10,meta_index) by analytics_tier | fields -_rank
| transpose row analytics_tier column meta_index

panels.title: Popular Source Categories Referenced by Queries
1op 10 Source Categories Referenced by Queries per Tier

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_sourcecategory\s*=\s*(?<meta_sourcecategory>[^\s\|\)]+)" multi nodrop 
| where meta_sourcecategory!=""
| count by meta_sourcecategory,analytics_tier 
| topk(10,meta_sourcecategory) by analytics_tier | fields -_rank
| transpose row analytics_tier column meta_sourcecategory

panels.title: Other Popular Keys Referenced by Queries

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower 
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?<metadataName>_sourcehost|_sourcename|_source|_collector|\w+)\s*=\s*(?<metadataValue>[^\s\|\)]+)" multi nodrop 
| where metadataName not in ("_index","_view","_sourcecategory")
|where query_type matches "{{query_type}}" AND user_name matches "{{user_name}}"
|count as appearances by metadataname, metadatavalue
| where metadataname!="" | sort appearances | total(appearances) as total_appearances
| appearances/total_appearances*100 as percent | format ("%.2f%s", percent,"%") as percent

sourceDefinition.query:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:_index|_view)\s*=\s*(?<meta_index>[^\s\|\)]+)" multi nodrop 
| where meta_index!=""

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:_index|_view)\s*=\s*(?<meta_index>[^\s\|\)]+)" multi nodrop 
| where meta_index!=""

children.name: Enterprise Search Audit - Data Tier Usage Over Time
children.description: The Enterprise Search Audit - Data Tier Usage Over Time dashboard provides detailed insights into search usage by analytics tier. It displays the total number of searches and the types of queries run by users.
children.title: Enterprise Search Audit - Data Tier Usage Over Time

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier={{tier}}  
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| count as queries by query_type 
| sort by queries

panels.title: Avg Query RunTime (sec) by Query Type

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier={{tier}} 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| timeslice 15m 
| avg(execution_duration_ms) as query_time by query_type, _timeslice 
| query_time/1000 as query_time
| transpose row _timeslice column query_type

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier="{{tier}}" 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| round(execution_duration_ms/1000) as duration_seconds 
| execution_duration_ms / 1000 as query_time_s
| timeslice 15m
| pct(query_time_s,50,90,95,99) by _timeslice

panels.title: Scanned Bytes Used (GB) by Query Type

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier={{tier}} 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| timeslice 15m 
| sum(data_scanned_bytes) as data_scanned_bytes by query_type, _timeslice 
| int(data_scanned_bytes/1Gi) as data_scanned_bytes
| transpose row _timeslice column query_type

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier={{tier}}
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| timeslice 15m
| sum(data_scanned_bytes) as total_scanned, sum(data_retrieved_bytes) as total_retrieved by _timeslice
| int(total_scanned/1Gi) as total_scanned | int(total_retrieved/1Gi) as total_retrieved
| order by _timeslice

panels.title: Retrieved Bytes Used (GB) by Query Type

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier={{tier}} 
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| timeslice 15m 
| sum(data_retrieved_bytes) as data_retrieved_bytes by query_type, _timeslice 
| int(data_retrieved_bytes/1Gi) as data_retrieved_bytes
| transpose row _timeslice column query_type

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier={{tier}}  
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| sum(data_scanned_bytes) as data_scanned_bytes by query_type 
| int(data_scanned_bytes/1Gi) as data_scanned_bytes
| sort by data_scanned_bytes

panels.title: Monitoring Your Usage by Tier
panels.text:
Use this dashboard to monitor search usage in different tiers over the last 24 hours or longer periods to see the long-term search usage in your organization.
Change the value of the filter Tier to the tier you want to see.

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query analytics_tier={{tier}}  
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| sum(data_retrieved_bytes) as data_retrieved_bytes by query_type 
| int(data_retrieved_bytes/1Gi) as data_retrieved_bytes
| sort by data_retrieved_bytes

children.name: Enterprise Search Audit - Queries Characteristics and Opportunities to Improve
children.description: The Enterprise Search Audit - Queries Characteristics and Opportunities to Improve dashboard provides information about which of your queries take and don’t take advantage of important optimization techniques and metadata to improve efficiency.
children.title: Enterprise Search Audit - Queries Characteristics and Opportunities to Improve

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
//(query_type="Scheduled Search" or query_type="Interactive Dashboard" or query_type="Search API")
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| count as qCount, sum(data_scanned_bytes) as scanned by query,user_name,query_type
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower 
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| replace(scope_section_raw," ","") as scope_section | if (scope_section="" or isNull(scope_section) or scope_section="*",1, 0) as  select_all
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<meta>sourcecategory|sourcehost|collector|source|sourcename)\s*="  nodrop  | if (meta!="",1,0) as use_meta
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<idx>view|index)\s*="  nodrop  | if (idx!="",1,0) as use_idx
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:^|\s+)(?<kfield>\w+)\s*="  nodrop  | if (kfield!="" and !(kfield in ("sourcecategory","collector","index","view","source","sourcehost","sourcename")),1,0) as use_field
| 0 as use_kw | parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:^|\s+)(?<first>\"[^\"]+\"|\'[^\']+\'|[\w\"\']+)(?<bridge>\s*=\s*|\s+|$)(?<second>\w+|$)" multi nodrop | if ( !(bridge matches "*=*") and select_all!=1,1,use_kw) as use_kw
| max(use_kw) as use_kw, max(use_field) as use_field, max(use_meta) as use_meta, max(use_idx) as use_idx, max(qCount) as queries, max(scanned) as scanned_bytes by query,user_name, query_type 
| (scanned_bytes/1Gi) as scanned_gbytes | fields -scanned_bytes
| (use_kw+use_field+use_meta+use_idx) as optimizations
| where optimizations =0
| fields -use_kw,use_field,use_idx,optimizations,use_meta
| sort by scanned_gbytes

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query query_type="Interactive Dashboard"
| sum(data_scanned_bytes) as scanned_bytes, sum(data_retrieved_bytes) as retrieved_bytes by user_name, query, session_id, execution_duration_ms 
| round(execution_duration_ms/1000) as duration_seconds 
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower 
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| replace(scope_section_raw," ","") as scope_section 
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<meta>sourcecategory|sourcehost|collector|source|sourcename)\s*="  nodrop
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<idx>view|index)\s*="  nodrop  
| where ( isEmpty(idx) AND isEmpty(meta))
| fields -queryLower,session_id,execution_duration_ms, scope_section_raw,_some_matched, scope_section,meta,idx

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| count as queries by query
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower 
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| replace(scope_section_raw," ","") as scope_section | if (scope_section="" or isNull(scope_section) or scope_section="*",1, 0) as  select_all
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<meta>sourcecategory|sourcehost|collector|source|sourcename)\s*="  nodrop  | if (meta!="",1,0) as use_meta
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<idx>view|index)\s*="  nodrop  | if (idx!="",1,0) as use_idx
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:^|\s+)(?<kfield>\w+)\s*="  nodrop  | if (kfield!="" and !(kfield in ("sourcecategory","collector","index","view","source","sourcehost","sourcename")),1,0) as use_field
| 0 as use_kw | parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:^|\s+)(?<first>\"[^\"]+\"|\'[^\']+\'|[\w\"\']+)(?<bridge>\s*=\s*|\s+|$)(?<second>\w+|$)" multi nodrop | if ( !(bridge matches "*=*") and select_all!=1,1,use_kw) as use_kw
| max(use_kw) as use_kw, max(use_field) as use_field, max(use_meta) as use_meta, max(use_idx) as use_idx, max(queries) as queries by query
| (use_kw+use_field+use_meta+use_idx) as optimizations
| format("%d Optimizations",int(optimizations)) as OptimizationsStr
//| where optimizationsStr matches "4*" 
| sum(queries) as queries by optimizationsStr | sort by optimizationsStr

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query
//| "_sourcecategory=cqsplitter DefaultPerCustomerLagTracker \"current lag\" " as query 
| count as qCount, sum(data_scanned_bytes) as scanned by query,user_name
| toLowerCase(query) as queryLower 
| parse regex field=queryLower "^(?<scope_section_raw>[^\|]+)" nodrop 
| replace(scope_section_raw," ","") as scope_section | if (scope_section="" or isNull(scope_section) or scope_section="*",1, 0) as  select_all
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<meta>sourcecategory|sourcehost|collector|source|sourcename)\s*="  nodrop  | if (meta!="",1,0) as use_meta
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "_(?<idx>view|index)\s*="  nodrop  | if (idx!="",1,0) as use_idx
| parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:^|\s+)(?<kfield>\w+)\s*="  nodrop  | if (kfield!="" and !(kfield in ("sourcecategory","collector","index","view","source","sourcehost","sourcename")),1,0) as use_field
| 0 as use_kw | parse regex field=scope_section_raw "(?:^|\s+)(?<first>\"[^\"]+\"|\'[^\']+\'|[\w\"\']+)(?<bridge>\s*=\s*|\s+|$)(?<second>\w+|$)" multi nodrop | if ( !(bridge matches "*=*") and select_all!=1,1,use_kw) as use_kw
| max(use_kw) as use_kw, max(use_field) as use_field, max(use_meta) as use_meta, max(use_idx) as use_idx, max(qCount) as qCount, max(scanned) as scanned by query,user_name 
| scanned/1Gi as scanned
| (use_kw+use_field+use_meta+use_idx) as optimizations
| format("%d Optimizations",int(optimizations)) as %"Optimization Techniques"
// To look for queries WITH a given number of optimizations, uncomment and modify the following line and comment the last line
//| where optimizationsStr matches "0*" 
| sum(qCount) as queries, sum(scanned) as scanned_in_GB by %"Optimization Techniques" 
| total(queries) as total_queries | total(scanned_in_gb) as total_scanned_in_gb 
| toInt((queries/total_queries)*100) as queries_pct | toInt((scanned_in_gb/total_scanned_in_gb)*100) as scanned_pct 
| format("%.2f",scanned_in_gb) as scanned_in_gb
| fields -total_queries,total_scanned_in_gb
| sort by %"Optimization Techniques"

panels.title: Search Optimization Considerations
panels.text:
Incorporating the following optimizations into your queries can help improve your search performance while getting exactly the same results:

* Partitions and Views
* Keywords
* Metadata
* Extracted fields

# Partitions and Views
Leverage popular search categories to create partitions and let your team know these partitions are available. Partitions speed up searches on queries because only the data in that partition is scanned.
Help your team leverage existing configured partitions and views to speed up their searches and reduce load on the system which in turn will speed up queries for other team members as well.

# Keywords
Choosing specific keywords can help narrow your log searches. Combine with search metadata for fields such as _collector, _sourceCategory, _sourceName, and _sourceHost to narrow your search even further.

# Other [Metadata](https://help.sumologic.com/Search/Get_Started_with_Search/Search_Basics/Search_Metadata)
Patterns observed in other metadata such as collector, sourceHost, sourceCategory, and source name can also be used to create partitions, improve partitions and reduce load.

# Extracted Fields
Field extractions allow you to parse fields from your log messages at the time the messages are ingested, saves time when you parse fields at the query level. With Field Extraction Rules (FERs), you can standardize field names and searches, simplify the search syntax and scope definition, and improve search performance.

Note: The key to efficiently retrieving data with the query is to be as specific as possible in your source expression i.e. before the first | (pipe) in the query. You can visit our online help for more information on [Search Best Practices](https://help.sumologic.com/Search/Get-Started-with-Search/How-to-Build-a-Search/Best-Practices%3A-7-Search-Rules-to-Live-By).

panels.title: Search Concepts
panels.text:
This dashboard provides a high-level overview of search usage within your account. You can drill-down from all panels here into the next-level dashboards.

###Search
There are many searches you can run on Sumo Logic. For example, interactive searches can be executed by users manually using the Sumo Logic UI. Similarly, searches can be run with the Sumo Logic API, or Interactive Dashboard searches represent searches that power the panels in a Sumo Logic interactive dashboard. Another example would be a scheduled search run in the background. [More information.](https://help.sumologic.com/Search/Get_Started_with_Search/Search_Basics/About_Search_Basics). For basic search best practices, see [our help.](https://help.sumologic.com/Search/Get_Started_with_Search/How_to_Build_a_Search/Best_Practices%3A_7_Search_Rules_to_Live_By)

Data for this app is provided by the Search Audit Index, for more information on this index, see [here](https://help.sumologic.com/?cid=06040648)
