children.name: Flex
children.description: Flex

children.name: Content items with scan volume > 10x of avg daily ingest of last 30 days

search.queryText:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query 
| "dummy" as dummy // this field is only used to artificially link the parent query and subquery
| where [subquery from=(-30d) to=(-1d):
              // this subquery saves the average daily ingest for the org to a lookup table
              _index=sumologic_volume _sourceCategory=view_and_tier_volume 
              | parse regex "\"field\":\"(?<field>.*?)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<tier>.*?)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<size>.*?)," multi
              | where tier in ("Continuous", "Infrequent", "Frequent", "Flex")  
              | timeslice 1d 
              | where (queryStartTime() < _timeslice and queryEndTime() > __timeslice_end) // this eliminates partial time slices
              | sum(size) as dailyIngest by _timeslice
              | avg(dailyIngest) as avgDailyIngest
              | round(avgDailyIngest,0) as avgDailyIngest
              // create artificial primary key for later use as lookup in parent query
              | 0 as pkey
              // save the avgDailyIngest and primary key to legacy lookup table
              | save /avgDailyIngest2
              // create dummy field to link to parent query
              | "dummy" as dummy
              | compose dummy]
// break out the scan volume for each query by tier
| parse regex field=scanned_bytes_breakdown "\"(?<tier>[a-zA-Z]+)\" \: (?<tier_scanned_bytes>[0-9]+)" multi nodrop
| sum(tier_scanned_bytes) as avgDailyScanned by tier, query_type, content_name, content_identifier
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| 0 as pkey
| lookup avgDailyIngest from /avgDailyIngest2 on  pkey=pkey
| fields -pkey
// calculate the scan of each query to the overall ingest
| round(100*avgDailyScanned/avgDailyIngest,0) as percent_scan_of_ingest
| where percent_scan_of_ingest > 1000
| sort percent_scan_of_ingest

children.description: This search helps in monitoring all content items (scheduled search, monitors, dashboards)  for whom daily average volume of data scanned is > 10x of average daily ingest of last 30 days.

children.name: Flex - Capacity Utilization
children.description: This dashboard displays the subscribed, actual, and percentage capacity utilization for logs and metrics
children.title: Flex - Capacity Utilization

panels.title: Panel Query Configuration Note
panels.text:
The "Subscribed_Daily_Log_Ingest_Capacity" and "Subscribed_Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity" values needs to be configured based on Account Subscription.

Refer: Administration > Account > Account Overview to get your Capacity Values.

Configure the "Subscribed Daily Log Ingest Capacity"  and  "Subscribed Metric DPM Ingest Capacity" value in the variable

panels.title: Account Overages Note
panels.text: Your account is probably experiencing account overages if you see "Log Ingest Capacity Utilization" and or "DPM Ingest Capacity Utilization" panel showing more than 100%.

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as sourcecategory, dataTier, bytes, count
| where _sourceCategory matches "collector_and_tier_volume"  and dataTier matches "Flex"
| avg(bytes)
| {{Subscribed_Log_Data_Scan_Capacity}} as %"DailyLogDataScanCapacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| fields %"DailyLogDataScanCapacity"

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query (analytics_tier="Flex")  !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| timeslice 1d
| sum (sizeInGB) as total_data_scanned_GB by _timeslice
| avg(total_data_scanned_GB) as %"AvgLogDataScanPerDay"

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query (analytics_tier="Flex")  !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| timeslice 1d
| sum (sizeInGB) as total_data_scanned_GB by _timeslice
| avg(total_data_scanned_GB) as %"AvgLogDataScanPerDay"
//| sort by total_data_scanned_GB
//| ingest_gbytes / duration_in_day as %"AvgLogIngestPerDay"
| {{Subscribed_Log_Data_Scan_Capacity}} as %"DailyLogDataScanCapacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| (%"AvgLogDataScanPerDay"/%"DailyLogDataScanCapacity")*100 as %"LogDataScan_Capacity_Utilization"
| fields %"LogDataScan_Capacity_Utilization"

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints
| where _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm 
| {{Subscribed_Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity}} as %"DPM_Capacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| fields -datapoints, duration_in_min, dpm

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints
| where _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm 
| fields -datapoints, duration_in_min

_index=sumologic_volume dataPoints
| where _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| datapoints / duration_in_min as dpm 
| {{Subscribed_Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity}} as %"DPM_Capacity" // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| (dpm/%"DPM_Capacity")*100 as %"DPM_Capacity_Utilization"
| fields -datapoints, duration_in_min, dpm, %"DPM_Capacity"

panels.title: Tracing Ingest
panels.text: Tracing is a credit only model and does not support the concept of Ingest Capacity .

children.name: Flex - Credits Consumed
children.description: The Credits Consumed dashboard provides visibility into the total amount of Cloud Flex Credits your organization has consumed. This allows you to monitor and control search costs.
children.title: Flex - Credits Consumed

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query (analytics_tier="Flex")  !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| sizeInGB * {{credits_conversion}} as credits_consumed

queries.queryString:

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query (analytics_tier="Flex")  !(status_message="Query Failed")
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| where query_type matches "{{query_type}}"
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
| data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| sizeInGB * {{credits_conversion}} as credits_consumed
| timeslice 1d
| sum (credits_consumed) as total_credits_consumed, count as query_count by _timeslice

| avg(total_credits_consumed) as avg_credits_consumed

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query (analytics_tier="Flex")  !(status_message="Query Failed")
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| where query_type matches "{{query_type}}"
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name, query_start_time, query_end_time

children.name: Flex - Log Spikes
children.description: The Log Spikes Dashboard helps to review details of your data ingested for logs.
children.title: Flex - Log Spikes

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume 
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
| where _sourceCategory matches "collector_and_tier_volume" and dataTier="Flex"
| timeslice 1d
| bytes/1024/1024/1024 as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice
| outlier gbytes

_index=sumologic_volume 
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
| where _sourceCategory matches "collector_and_tier_volume" and dataTier="Flex"
| timeslice 1d
| bytes/1024/1024/1024 as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice, collector
| sort _timeslice desc, gbytes desc
| 1 as rownum
| accum rownum by _timeslice
| where _accum <= 5 // limit by this
| fields _timeslice, gbytes, collector
| transpose row _timeslice column collector

panels.title: Top Ingest Spikes for Top 5 Collectors Per Day

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume
| parse regex "(?<data>\{[^\{]+\})" multi
| json field=data "field","dataTier","sizeInBytes","count" as collector, dataTier, bytes, count
| where _sourceCategory matches "collector_and_tier_volume" and dataTier="Flex"
| timeslice 1d
| bytes/1024/1024/1024 as gbytes 
| sum(gbytes) as gbytes by _timeslice, collector
| compare with timeshift 1d
| sort _timeslice desc, gbytes desc
| 1 as rownum
| accum rownum by _timeslice
| where _accum <= 5 // limit by this
| fields _timeslice, gbytes, gbytes_1d, collector
| if (!(isNull(gbytes_1d)), ((gbytes - gbytes_1d) / gbytes_1d) * 100, gbytes * 100) as percent_diff
| if (isNull(gbytes_1d), 0, gbytes_1d) as gbytes_1d
| where percent_diff > 0
| sort percent_diff
| limit 25
| fields _timeslice, collector, percent_diff, gbytes, gbytes_1d

panels.title: Daily Ingest Vs Average Daily Ingest Capacity

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume datapoints
| where _sourceCategory matches "{{MetricsSources}}"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1d
| sum(datapoints) as daily_ingest_datapoints by _timeslice
| {{Subscribed_Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity}} as DPM_Capacity // This is account contract based value. Customize this value. Can be found in Administration > Account > Account Overview
| DPM_Capacity * 60 * 24 as DataPoint_Capacity // Set this calculated value through gear icon for "Colors by Value Range..."
| fields -DPM_Capacity

panels.title: Note: Daily Ingest Capacity
panels.text:
The "Subscribed Metric DPM Ingest Capacity" values needs to be configured based on Account Subscription.

Refer: Administration > Account > Account Overview to get your Capacity Values.

Configure the "Subscribed_Metric_DPM_Ingest_Capacity" value in the variable

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume datapoints
| where _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1h
| sum(datapoints) as datapoints by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc 
| smooth datapoints as moving_avg | datapoints as curr_hrs_datapoints
| 70 as spikePercent
| where curr_hrs_datapoints >= (1 + spikePercent / 100) * moving_avg
| fields -spikePercent

_index=sumologic_volume datapoints
| where _sourceCategory="collector_metrics_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"dataPoints\"\:(?<datapoints>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1h
| sum(datapoints) as curr_hrs_datapoints by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc 
| diff curr_hrs_datapoints
| where !isNull(_diff)
| (_diff+curr_hrs_datapoints) as prev_hrs_datapoints
| ((_diff / curr_hrs_datapoints) * 100) as pct_incr
| 50 as spikePercent
| where (-1 * pct_incr) > spikePercent
| abs(pct_incr) as pct_incr
| fields _timeslice, curr_hrs_datapoints, prev_hrs_datapoints, pct_incr

panels.title: Note for Ingest Spike Panels
panels.text:
Ingest Spike (Moving Avg) - This panel will show incidents when current hour ingest is 70% above moving average ingest.

Ingest Spike (Last Data Point) -  This panel will show incidents when current hour ingest is 50% above last (earlier) hour ingest.

| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "{{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 source by % "{{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume 
| where _sourceCategory matches "{{Tracingsources}}"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 6h
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
|outlier %"{{Unit}}"

_index=sumologic_volume 
| where _sourceCategory matches"{{Tracingsources}}"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 6h
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
| predict %"{{Unit}}" by 6h model=ar, forecast=20

_index=sumologic_volume 
| where _sourceCategory="collector_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1h
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc 
| smooth %"{{Unit}}"  as moving_avg | %"{{Unit}}"  as %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}"
| 70 as spikePercent
| where %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}" >= (1 + spikePercent / 100) * moving_avg
| fields -spikePercent

_index=sumologic_volume 
| where _sourceCategory="collector_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<collector>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
| timeslice 1h
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}" by _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice asc 
| diff %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}"
| where !isNull(_diff)
| (_diff+%"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}") as %"prev_hrs_{{Unit}}"
| ((_diff / %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}") * 100) as pct_incr
| 50 as spikePercent
| where (-1 * pct_incr) > spikePercent
| abs(pct_incr) as pct_incr
| fields _timeslice, %"curr_hrs_{{Unit}}", %"prev_hrs_{{Unit}}", pct_incr

panels.title: Note for Ingest Spike Panels of {{Unit}}
panels.text:
Ingest Spike (Moving Avg) - This panel will show incidents when current hour ingest is 70% above moving average ingest.

Ingest Spike (Last Data Point) -  This panel will show incidents when current hour ingest is 50% above last (earlier) hour ingest.

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_volume 
| where _sourceCategory="sourcename_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<sourceName>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by sourceName
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min
| %"{{Unit}}" / duration_in_min as % "{{Unit}} per minute"
| top 5 sourceName by % "{{Unit}} per minute"

_index=sumologic_volume 
| where _sourceCategory="service_tracing_volume"
| parse regex "\"(?<source>[^\"]+)\"\:\{\"billedBytes\"\:(?<billedBytes>\d+)\,\"spansCount\"\:(?<spansCount>\d+)\}" multi
|sum({{Unit}}) as %"{{Unit}}" by source
| ((queryEndTime() - queryStartTime())/(1000*60)) as duration_in_min

search.queryText:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query (analytics_tier="flex")  !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| sizeInGB * {{credits_consumed_factor}} as credits_consumed

children.name: Infrequent Data Tier - Credits Consumed
children.description: The Infrequent Data Tier - Credits Consumed dashboard provides visibility into the total amount of Cloud Flex Credits your organization has consumed with infrequent queries. This allows you to monitor and control on-demand search costs for the Infrequent Tier.
children.title: Infrequent Data Tier - Credits Consumed

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query  !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown "Infrequent" as data_scanned_bytes
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| sizeInGB * {{credits_consumed}} as credits_consumed
| timeslice 1d
| sum (credits_consumed) as total_credits_consumed, count as query_count by _timeslice 
| fillmissing timeslice (1d)
| avg(total_credits_consumed) as avg_credits_consumed

panels.title: Geo Location of Users executing queries

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query  !(user_name=*sumologic.com)
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown "Infrequent" as data_scanned_bytes| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Ti as sizeInTB
| sizeInTB * 4 as cost_in_usd
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = remote_ip
|where if ("{{user_name}}" = "*", true, user_name matches "{{user_name}}") AND if ("{{session_id}}" = "*", true, session_id matches "{{session_id}}") AND if ("{{is_aggregate}}" = "*", true, toString(is_aggregate) matches "{{is_aggregate}}") AND if ("{{status_message}}" = "*", true, status_message matches "{{status_message}}") AND if ("{{query}}" = "*", true, query matches "{{query}}") AND if ("{{query_type}}" = "*", true, query_type matches "{{query_type}}")
|count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code
| sort _count

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query  !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown "Infrequent" as data_scanned_bytes
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| timeslice 1d
|where if ("{{user_name}}" = "*", true, user_name matches "{{user_name}}") AND if ("{{session_id}}" = "*", true, session_id matches "{{session_id}}") AND if ("{{is_aggregate}}" = "*", true, toString(is_aggregate) matches "{{is_aggregate}}")  AND if ("{{status_message}}" = "*", true, status_message matches "{{status_message}}") AND if ("{{query}}" = "*", true, query matches "{{query}}") AND if ("{{query_type}}" = "*", true, query_type matches "{{query_type}}")
|sum (sizeInGB) as total_data_scanned_GB by  _timeslice, user_name 
| where if ("{{total_data_scanned_GB}}" = "0", true, total_data_scanned_GB > {{total_data_scanned_GB}})
| transpose row _timeslice column user_name

children.description: The Infrequent Data Tier - Query Analysis dashboard provides visibility into the Infrequent Data Tier queries that are most expensive, as well as detailed information on the queries.
children.title: Infrequent Data Tier - Query Analysis

queries.queryString:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query  !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown "Infrequent" as data_scanned_bytes
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name, query_start_time, query_end_time
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| query_end_time - query_start_time as query_time_range_hrs
| query_time_range_hrs / 3600000 as query_time_range_hrs
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
|where if ("{{query_time_range_hrs}}" = "0", true, query_time_range_hrs > {{query_time_range_hrs}}) AND if ("{{user_name}}" = "*", true, user_name matches "{{user_name}}") AND if ("{{session_id}}" = "*", true, session_id matches "{{session_id}}") AND if ("{{is_aggregate}}" = "*", true, toString(is_aggregate) matches "{{is_aggregate}}") AND if ("{{status_message}}" = "*", true, status_message matches "{{status_message}}") AND if ("{{query}}" = "*", true, query matches "{{query}}") AND if ("{{query_type}}" = "*", true, query_type matches "{{query_type}}")
|count (query) as query_count, sum(sizeInGB) as total_data_scanned_GB by query
| where if ("{{total_data_scanned_GB}}" = "0", true, total_data_scanned_GB > {{total_data_scanned_GB}})
| total_data_scanned_GB/query_count as %"Average Data Scanned per Query"
| fields query, query_count, %"Average Data Scanned per Query", total_data_scanned_GB
| sort by total_data_scanned_GB
| limit 50

_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query  !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown "Infrequent" as data_scanned_bytes
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name,query_start_time, query_end_time
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
| query_end_time - query_start_time as query_time_range_hrs
| query_time_range_hrs / 3600000 as query_time_range_hrs
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
|where if ("{{query_time_range_hrs}}" = "0", true, query_time_range_hrs > {{query_time_range_hrs}}) AND if ("{{user_name}}" = "*", true, user_name matches "{{user_name}}") AND if ("{{session_id}}" = "*", true, session_id matches "{{session_id}}") AND if ("{{is_aggregate}}" = "*", true, toString(is_aggregate) matches "{{is_aggregate}}") AND if ("{{status_message}}" = "*", true, status_message matches "{{status_message}}") AND if ("{{query}}" = "*", true, query matches "{{query}}") AND if ("{{query_type}}" = "*", true, query_type matches "{{query_type}}")
|sum(sizeInGB) as total_data_scanned_GB by query, is_aggregate, query_type, status_message, user_name, session_id, query_time_range_hrs

children.name: Org's total Credits value exceeded input Credit

search.queryText:
_view=sumologic_search_usage_per_query  !(user_name=*sumologic.com) !(status_message="Query Failed")	
| json field=scanned_bytes_breakdown "Infrequent" as data_scanned_bytes
| fields data_scanned_bytes, query, is_aggregate, query_type, remote_ip, retrieved_message_count, scanned_message_count, scanned_partition_count, session_id, status_message, user_name
| if (query_type == "View Maintenance", "Scheduled Views", query_type) as query_type
|data_scanned_bytes / 1Gi as sizeInGB
| sizeInGB * {{credits_consumed_factor}} as credits_consumed
| sum (credits_consumed) as total_credits_consumed
| where total_credits_consumed >= {{Total_Credits_Consumed}}

queryParameters.name: credits_consumed_factor
queryParameters.label: credits_consumed_factor
queryParameters.description: Credits Consumed Conversion: Default Value is 0.016. You can find this value from "Credit Table"

queryParameters.name: Total_Credits_Consumed
queryParameters.label: Total_Credits_Consumed
queryParameters.description: Enter Data Credits Value ; example : 10. No Special chars allowed.
